tika-abh06t:11_0: Vanditvā sirasā buddhaṃ, dhammaṃ sādhugaṇampi ca.
tika-abh06t:58_0: Yasmiṃ pana padese so, kāmoyaṃ duvidhopi ca;
tika-abh06t:67_0: Svāyaṃ rūpabhavo rūpaṃ, evaṃ kāmoti saññito;
tika-abh06t:70_0: Tasmiṃ kāme idaṃ cittaṃ, sadāvacaratīti ca;
tika-abh06t:88_0: Puna tīṇeva sambhonti, dasa puññakriyāpi ca.
tika-abh06t:93_0: Purimā muñcanā ceva, parā tissopi cetanā;
tika-abh06t:94_0: Hoti dānamayaṃ puññaṃ, evaṃ sesesu dīpaye.
tika-abh06t:95_0: Idāni assa panaṭṭhavidhassāpi kāmāvacarakusalacittassa ayamuppattikkamo veditabbo.
tika-abh06t:95_2: aññaṃ vā somanassahetuṃ āgamma haṭṭhapahaṭṭho “atthi dinna”nti ādinayappavattaṃ sammādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā parehi anussāhito dānādīni puññāni karoti,
tika-abh06t:95_3: tadāssa somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ paṭhamaṃ mahākusalacittaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh06t:95_4: Yadā pana vuttanayeneva haṭṭhapahaṭṭho sammādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā parehi ussāhito karoti,
tika-abh06t:95_6: Imasmiṃ panatthe saṅkhāroti attano vā parassa vā pavattassa pubbappayogassādhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh06t:95_7: Yadā pana ñātijanassa paṭipattidassanena jātaparicayā bālakā bhikkhū disvā somanassajātā sahasā yaṃ kiñci hatthagataṃ dadanti vā vandanti vā,
tika-abh06t:95_11: evaṃ ñātijanena ussāhitā hutvā hatthagataṃ dadanti vā vandanti vā,
tika-abh06t:95_13: Yadā pana deyyadhammappaṭiggāhakādīnaṃ asampattiṃ vā aññesaṃ vā somanassahetūnaṃ abhāvaṃ āgamma catūsupi vikappesu somanassarahitā honti,
tika-abh06t:100_0: Sattarasa sahassāni, dve satāni asīti ca;
tika-abh06t:102_0: Taṃ pana yathānurūpaṃ kāmāvacarasugatiyaṃ bhavabhogasampattiṃ abhinipphādeti.
tika-abh06t:103_10: vitakkavicārapītisukhavippahīnaṃ upekkhācittekaggatāsampayuttaṃ pañcamanti idaṃ pañcavidhaṃ rūpāvacarakusalacittaṃ nāma.
tika-abh06t:104_0: Taṃ pana yathāsambhavaṃ pathavīkasiṇādīsu ārammaṇesu pavattivasena anekavidhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh06t:104_1: Sabbaṃ panetaṃ rūpāvacarabhāvanāpuññavasappavattaṃ yathānurūpaṃ rūpāvacarūpapattinipphādakaṃ hoti.
tika-abh06t:105_0: Sesesu pana dvīsu arūpāvacarakusalacittaṃ tāva upekkhāvedanāyogabhedato ekavidhaṃ,
tika-abh06t:105_10: sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ,
tika-abh06t:105_14: Sabbaṃ panetaṃ arūpāvacarabhāvanāpuññavasappavattaṃ yathānurūpaṃ arūpūpapattinipphādakaṃ hoti.
tika-abh06t:106_11: Sabbaṃ panetaṃ lokuttarabhāvanāpuññavasappavattaṃ maggānurūpaphalappavattiyā cattāro ariyapuggale abhinipphādeti.
tika-abh06t:108_0: Kāme aṭṭheva rūpe ca, pañca cattārirūpisu;
tika-abh06t:115_1: niyatāniyatavatthuvasena ca ekahetukaduhetukavasena ca paṭisandhijanakājanakavasena ca duvidhaṃ,
tika-abh06t:115_2: tīhi vedanāhi yogato ca lobhamūlaṃ dosamūlaṃ mohamūlanti mūlato ca tividhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh06t:115_3: Tattha lobhamūlaṃ pana somanassupekkhādiṭṭhippayogabhedato aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh06t:116_0: Yadā hi “natthi kāmesu ādīnavo”tiādinā nayena micchādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā kevalaṃ haṭṭhatuṭṭho kāme vā paribhuñjati,
tika-abh06t:116_1: diṭṭhamaṅgalādīni vā sārato pacceti sabhāvatikkheneva anussāhitena cittena,
tika-abh06t:116_5: Yadā micchādiṭṭhiṃ apurakkhatvā kevalaṃ haṭṭhatuṭṭho methunaṃ dhammaṃ vā paribhuñjati,
tika-abh06t:116_7: parassa bhaṇḍaṃ vā harati sabhāvatikkheneva anussāhitena cittena,
tika-abh06t:116_11: Yadā pana kāmānaṃ vā asampattiṃ āgamma aññesaṃ vā somanassahetūnaṃ abhāvena catūsupi vikappesu somanassarahitā honti,
tika-abh06t:117_3: Assa pana pāṇātipātādīsu tikkhamandappavattikāle uppatti veditabbā.
tika-abh06t:118_0: Mohamūlampi vicikicchuddhaccayogato duvidhaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ vicikicchāsampayuttaṃ,
tika-abh06t:126_2: Tattha vipākacittaṃ bhūmibhedato catubbidhaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ lokuttaranti.
tika-abh06t:127_0: Tattha sahetukavipākacittaṃ sakakusalaṃ viya somanassupekkhāñāṇappayogabhedato aṭṭhavidhaṃ.
tika-abh06t:128_0: Yathā panassa kusalaṃ dānādivasena chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati,
tika-abh06t:128_2: Idaṃ hi paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutitadārammaṇavasena parittadhammapariyāpannesuyeva chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati.
tika-abh06t:128_3: Sampayuttadhammānañca visese asatipi ādāsatalādīsu mukhanimittaṃ viya nirussāhaṃ vipākaṃ,
tika-abh06t:143_0: Appavattanato ceva, pākā puññehi no samā.
tika-abh06t:148_0: Tathā viratiyo tisso, na panetesu jāyare;
tika-abh06t:149_0: Pañca sikkhāpadā vuttā, kusalāti hi satthunā.
tika-abh06t:155_0: Ñeyyaṃ paccayato ceva, vipākesu ca viññunā.
tika-abh06t:163_7: upekkhāsahagataṃ ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātusantīraṇanti idaṃ pana aṭṭhavidhaṃ ahetukavipākacittaṃ nāma.
tika-abh06t:168_0: Taṃ sabbaṃ pana ahetukavipākacittaṃ kiccato aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh06t:170_4: Tattha paṭhamā ekantamiṭṭhārammaṇe pavattisabbhāvato somanassayuttāva hutvā pañcadvāre santīraṇakiccaṃ sādhayamānā pañcasu dvāresu ṭhatvā vipaccati,
tika-abh06t:170_5: chasu pana dvāresu balavārammaṇe tadārammaṇaṃ hutvā vipaccati.
tika-abh06t:170_6: Dutiyā pana iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe pavattisabbhāvato upekkhāsahagatā hutvā santīraṇatadārammaṇapaṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena
tika-abh06t:170_8: Manussaloke tāva jaccandhajaccabadhirajaccajaḷajaccummattakapaṇḍakaubhatobyañjananapuṃsakādīnaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇakāle paṭisandhi hutvā vipaccati.
tika-abh06t:170_9: Paṭisandhiyā vītivattāya pavattiyaṃ yāvatāyukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ hutvā vipaccati.
tika-abh06t:170_12: maraṇakāle cuti hutvāti imesu pana pañcasu ṭhānesu vipaccatīti.
tika-abh06t:174_7: upekkhācittekaggatāsampayuttaṃ pañcamanti imāni pañcapi rūpāvacaravipākacittāni upapattiyaṃ paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena pavattanti.
tika-abh06t:175_1: Tāni sakakusalāni viya ārammaṇabhedato catubbidhāni honti. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh06t:193_0: Sesaṃ sabbaṃ ca sesena, kusalena samaṃ mataṃ. –
tika-abh06t:210_0: Ettha pana upekkhāsahagatāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu ekādasavidhenāpi akusalacittena kamme āyūhite kammakammanimittagatinimittesu
tika-abh06t:210_1: aññataraṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā catūsu apāyesu paṭisandhi hutvā vipaccati,
tika-abh06t:210_2: paṭisandhiyā vītivattāya dutiyacittavāraṃ tato paṭṭhāya yāvatāyukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ hutvā,
tika-abh06t:214_5: cakkhuviññāṇādibhedato akusalavipākaṃ sattavidhanti chattiṃsavidhaṃ vipākacittaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh06t:218_4: Tattha sahetukaṃ ekavidhaṃ arahato eva uppajjanato.
tika-abh06t:218_15: Etāni pana yathānurūpaṃ dānādivasena khīṇāsavānaṃyeva pavattanti.
tika-abh06t:220_0: Tattha kiriyāhetukamanodhātu upekkhāsahagatā hadayavatthuṃ nissāya cakkhudvāre iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattaaniṭṭhaaniṭṭhamajjhattesu
tika-abh06t:220_1: rūpārammaṇesu yena kenaci pasāde ghaṭṭite taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā āvajjanavasena cakkhuviññāṇassa purecārī
tika-abh06t:220_4: Itarā pana dve ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātuyo sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇāti duvidhā honti.
tika-abh06t:220_5: Tattha asādhāraṇā pana kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu somanassasahagatā khīṇāsavasseva chasu dvāresu chasu
tika-abh06t:220_9: sā tīsu bhavesu sabbesaṃ sacittakasattānaṃ sādhāraṇā,
tika-abh06t:220_10: na kassaci pana sacittakassa na uppajjati nāma.
tika-abh06t:221_3: akusalato catūhīti imehi aṭṭhahi cittehi puthujjanā hasanti,
tika-abh06t:227_0: Chahi sekhā asekhā ca, hasanti pana pañcahi.
tika-abh06t:229_9: tāni pana sekhaputhujjanānaṃ bhāvanāpuññavasappavattānīti ayameva imesaṃ,
tika-abh06t:234_0: Yāva khīṇāsavo bhikkhu, na samāpajjateva naṃ;
tika-abh06t:235_0: Tāva tā kusalā eva, samāpannā sace kriyā.
tika-abh06t:248_2: vīsatividhaṃ kiriyacittanti ādimhi nikkhittaṃ cittaṃ ekūnanavutippabhedena vidhinā pakāsitaṃ hotīti.
tika-abh06t:254_0: Aṭṭha lokuttare katvā, niddiṭṭhā hi samāsato.
tika-abh06t:260_0: Ye taranti imaṃ lokaṃ, parañceva taranti teti.
tika-abh06t:269_1: Tesu kāmāvacarapaṭhamamahākusalacittasampayuttā tāva niyatā sarūpena āgatā ekūnatiṃsa dhammā honti.
tika-abh06t:269_3: phasso vedanā saññā cetanā vitakko vicāro pīti cittekaggatā saddhā sati vīriyaṃ paññā jīvitindriyaṃ alobho
tika-abh06t:269_4: adoso hirī ottappaṃ kāyappassaddhi cittappassaddhi kāyalahutā cittalahutā kāyamudutā cittamudutā kāyakammaññatā
tika-abh06t:269_11: Puna karuṇā muditā kāyaduccaritavirati vacīduccaritavirati micchājīvavirati ceti ime pañca aniyatā.
tika-abh06t:270_0: Imesu pana karuṇāmuditāvasena bhāvanākāle karuṇāpubbabhāgo vā muditāpubbabhāgo vā etā uppajjanti,
tika-abh06t:270_2: Yadā pana iminā cittena micchākammantādīhi viramati,
tika-abh06t:270_7: Tasmā etesu ekena saha catuttiṃseva dhammā honti.
tika-abh06t:275_0: Kasmā panettha mettā ca, upekkhā ca na uddhaṭā;
tika-abh06t:279_0: Upekkhā gahitā yasmā, tasmā na gahitā ubho.
tika-abh06t:282_0: Sarūpeneva sabbete, pāḷiyaṃ na ca uddhaṭā.
tika-abh06t:284_0: Yasmā aniyatā keci, yasmā rāsiṃ bhajanti na;
tika-abh06t:285_0: Yasmā ca dubbalā keci, tasmā vuttā na pāḷiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t:295_0: Phusitvā pana phassena, vedanāya ca vedaye;
tika-abh06t:296_0: Sañjānāti ca saññāya, cetanāya ca cetaye.
tika-abh06t:299_0: Phassova paṭhamaṃ vutto, tasmā idha mahesinā.
tika-abh06t:301_0: Akāraṇamidaṃ sabbaṃ, cittānaṃ tu saheva ca;
tika-abh06t:304_0: Ayaṃ tu paṭhamuppanno, ayaṃ pacchāti natthidaṃ;
tika-abh06t:308_0: Iccevaṃ pana viññeyyaṃ, viññunā na visesato.
tika-abh06t:312_0: Yasmā pana ime dhammā vacanatthalakkhaṇādīhi vuccamānā pākaṭā honti suviññeyyāva,
tika-abh06t:312_9: Ayaṃ hi arūpadhammopi samāno ārammaṇesu phusanākāreneva pavattati,
tika-abh06t:312_10: so dvinnaṃ meṇḍānaṃ sannipāto viya daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh06t:315_1: Saddhiṃ attanā sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇe abhisandahatīti attho.
tika-abh06t:318_0: Pinayatīti pīti. Sā sampiyāyanalakkhaṇā, kāyacittapīṇanarasā, pharaṇarasā vā, odagyapaccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh06t:324_1: Taṃ pana attanā avinibbhuttānaṃ dhammānaṃ anupālanalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh06t:324_5: Santepi ca tesaṃ anupālanalakkhaṇādimhi vidhāne atthikkhaṇeyeva taṃ te dhamme anupāleti udakaṃ viya uppalādīni,
tika-abh06t:324_6: yathāsakaṃ paccayuppannepi ca dhamme anupāleti dhāti viya kumāraṃ,
tika-abh06t:324_8: na bhaṅgato uddhaṃ pavattayati attano ca pavattayitabbānañca abhāvā,
tika-abh06t:324_9: na bhaṅgakkhaṇe ṭhapeti sayaṃ bhijjamānattā khīyamāno viya vattisnehova padīpasikhanti.
tika-abh06t:325_3: So ārammaṇe cittassa alaggabhāvalakkhaṇo kamaladale jalabindu viya,
tika-abh06t:337_0: Kiriyā kāro, manasmiṃ kāro manasikāro. Purimamanato visadisaṃ manaṃ karotīti ca manasikāro.
tika-abh06t:338_8: saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpanno ārammaṇapaṭipādakattena sampayuttānaṃ sārathī viya daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh06t:339_0: Karuṇāti paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakampanaṃ karotīti karuṇā,
tika-abh06t:341_2: Lakkhaṇādito pana etā tissopi viratiyo kāyaduccaritādivatthūnaṃ avītikkamalakkhaṇā,
tika-abh06t:341_6: Keci pana imāsu ekekaṃ niyataṃ viratiṃ icchanti.
tika-abh06t:341_7: Evaṃ kāmāvacarapaṭhamamahākusalacittena ime tettiṃsa vā catuttiṃsa vā dhammā sampayogaṃ gacchantīti veditabbā.
tika-abh06t:342_3: Puna tatiyena ñāṇavippayogato ṭhapetvā amohaṃ avasesā dvattiṃsa vā tettiṃsa vā veditabbā.
tika-abh06t:342_5: paṭhame vuttesu pana ṭhapetvā pītiṃ avasesā pañcamena sampayogaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh06t:342_12: Sattamena pana ṭhapetvā paññaṃ avasesā ekatiṃsa vā dvattiṃsa vā dhammā honti,
tika-abh06t:346_1: tattha paṭhamacittasampayuttā tāva kāmāvacarapaṭhamacitte vuttesu ṭhapetvā viratittayaṃ avasesā veditabbā.
tika-abh06t:346_4: Dutiyena vitakkavajjā dvattiṃsa vā tettiṃsa vā.
tika-abh06t:346_5: Tatiyena vicāravajjā ekatiṃsa vā dvattiṃsa vā.
tika-abh06t:346_6: Catutthena tato pītivajjā tiṃsa vā ekatiṃsa vā.
tika-abh06t:348_1: te pana paṭhamajjhānike maggacitte paṭhamarūpāvacaracitte vuttanayena dutiyajjhānikādibhedepi maggacitte
tika-abh06t:348_3: Karuṇāmuditānamabhāvo ca niyataviratibhāvo ca lokuttarabhāvo cettha viseso.
tika-abh06t:349_0: Akusalā pana cetasikā bhūmito ekavidhā kāmāvacarāyeva,
tika-abh06t:349_1: tesu lobhamūlapaṭhamākusalacittasampayuttā tāva niyatā sarūpenāgatā pannarasa,
tika-abh06t:349_3: Aniyatā cha yevāpanakāti sabbe pañcavīsati honti.
tika-abh06t:349_5: phasso somanassavedanā saññā cetanā vitakko vicāro pīti cittassekaggatā vīriyaṃ jīvitaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ
tika-abh06t:349_6: lobho moho micchādiṭṭhīti ime sarūpenāgatā pannarasa,
tika-abh06t:349_7: chando adhimokkho uddhaccaṃ manasikāroti ime cattāro niyatayevāpanakā,
tika-abh06t:349_8: ime pana paṭipāṭiyā dasasu cittesu niyatā honti,
tika-abh06t:349_9: māno issā macchariyaṃ kukkuccaṃ thinamiddhanti ime chayeva aniyatayevāpanakā.
tika-abh06t:363_1: Iti ime ekūnavīsati cetasikā paṭhamākusalacittena sampayogaṃ gacchantīti veditabbā.
tika-abh06t:363_4: Sasaṅkhārabhāvo cettha thinamiddhassa niyatabhāvo ca viseso.
tika-abh06t:363_5: Tatiyena paṭhame vuttesu ṭhapetvā diṭṭhiṃ sesā aṭṭhārasa veditabbā.
tika-abh06t:363_8: Catutthena dutiye vuttesu ṭhapetvā diṭṭhiṃ avasesā veditabbā.
tika-abh06t:363_10: Pañcamena paṭhame vuttesu ṭhapetvā pītiṃ avasesā sampayogaṃ gacchantīti.
tika-abh06t:363_15: Sattamena pañcame vuttesu ṭhapetvā diṭṭhiṃ avasesā veditabbā.
tika-abh06t:363_17: Aṭṭhamena chaṭṭhe vuttesu ṭhapetvā diṭṭhiṃ avasesā veditabbā.
tika-abh06t:364_0: Domanassasahagatesu paṭighasampayuttesu dosamūlesu dvīsu paṭhamena asaṅkhārikena sampayuttā niyatā sarūpenāgatā terasa.
tika-abh06t:364_2: phasso domanassavedanā saññā cetanā cittekaggatā vitakko vicāro vīriyaṃ jīvitaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ doso
tika-abh06t:364_3: moho ceti ime terasa dhammā chandādīhi catūhi niyatayevāpanakehi sattarasa honti issāmacchariyakukkuccesu
tika-abh06t:364_4: aniyatesu tīsu ekena saha aṭṭhārasa honti,
tika-abh06t:366_9: Iti ime sattarasa vā aṭṭhārasa vā navamena sampayogaṃ gacchantīti veditabbā.
tika-abh06t:367_0: Dvīsu pana mohamūlesu vicikicchāsampayuttena ekādasamena sampayuttā tāva phasso upekkhāvedanā saññā cetanā
tika-abh06t:367_1: vitakko vicāro vīriyaṃ jīvitaṃ cittaṭṭhiti ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ moho vicikicchāti sarūpenāgatā terasa,
tika-abh06t:368_2: Sabhāvaṃ vicinanto etāya kicchati kilamatīti vicikicchā.
tika-abh06t:369_0: Dvādasamena uddhaccasampayuttena sampayuttā sarūpenāgatā vicikicchāsahagate vuttesu vicikicchāhīnā uddhaccaṃ sarūpena āgataṃ,
tika-abh06t:370_2: Tattha vipākā kusalā viya bhūmivasena catubbidhā kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ lokuttarañceti.
tika-abh06t:370_8: Kāmāvacaravipākānaṃ ekantaparittārammaṇattā viratiyo panettha ekantakusalattā na labbhanti.
tika-abh06t:373_0: Bāttiṃsa pañcame chaṭṭhe, ekatiṃsa tato pare.
tika-abh06t:374_1: Tesu cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttā tāva phasso upekkhāvedanā saññā cetanā jīvitaṃ cittaṭṭhitīti sarūpenāgatā cha,
tika-abh06t:374_4: Tattha kāyaviññāṇasampayuttesu pana upekkhāṭhāne sukhavedanā paviṭṭhā.
tika-abh06t:377_0: Sati kasmā upekkhāva, vuttā catūsu satthunā.
tika-abh06t:384_1: Manodhātunā sampayuttā sarūpenāgatā cakkhuviññāṇena saddhiṃ vuttā cha,
tika-abh06t:384_3: adhimokkhamanasikārehi dvīhi yevāpanakehi dasa dhammā honti.
tika-abh06t:385_2: Te sabbepi attano attano kusalacittasampayuttacetasikehi sadisāyevāti.
tika-abh06t:386_1: Te sabbe tesaṃyeva lokuttaravipākacittānaṃ sadisā kusalacittasampayuttehi cetasikehi sadisā.
tika-abh06t:388_0: Kiriyābyākatā ca cetasikā bhūmito tividhā honti kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarā arūpāvacarāti.
tika-abh06t:388_3: te pana aṭṭhahi kāmāvacarakusalacittasampayuttehi samānā ṭhapetvā viratittayaṃ aniyatayevāpanakesu karuṇāmuditāyeva uppajjanti.
tika-abh06t:388_8: Hasituppādacittena sampayuttā dvādasa dhammā honti pītiyā saha.
tika-abh06t:389_3: Evaṃ vīsati kiriyacittasampayuttā ca cetasikā veditabbā.
tika-abh06t:390_0: Ettāvatā kusalākusalavipākakiriyabhedabhinnena ekūnanavutiyā cittena sampayuttā cetasikā niddiṭṭhā honti.
tika-abh06t:408_1: phasso vedanā saññā cetanā vitakko vicāro pīti cittekaggatā vīriyaṃ jīvitaṃ chando adhimokkho manasikāro
tika-abh06t:408_2: tatramajjhattatā saddhā sati hirī ottappaṃ alobho adoso amoho kāyappassaddhiādīni cha yugāni,
tika-abh06t:408_4: karuṇā muditā lobho doso moho uddhaccaṃ māno diṭṭhi issā macchariyaṃ kukkuccaṃ thinaṃ middhaṃ vicikicchā ahirikaṃ anottappañcāti.
tika-abh06t:416_0: Phassādīnaṃ tu dhammānaṃ, pavakkhāmi ito paraṃ;
tika-abh06t:422_0: Phasso ca vedanā saññā, cetanā jīvitindriyaṃ;
tika-abh06t:429_0: Upekkhā pañcapaññāsa-citte dukkhaṃ tu tīsu hi.
tika-abh06t:458_0: Tathā viratiyo tisso, sabbe te pañcavīsati;
tika-abh06t:464_0: Lobho doso ca moho ca, māno diṭṭhi ca saṃsayo;
tika-abh06t:470_0: Lobho aṭṭhasu niddiṭṭho, vuttā catūsu diṭṭhitu;
tika-abh06t:476_0: Phasso ca vedanā saññā, cetanā jīvitaṃ mano;
tika-abh06t:477_0: Vitakko ca vicāro ca, pīti vīriyasamādhi ca.
tika-abh06t:479_0: Chando cevādhimokkho ca, manasikāro ca cuddasa;
tika-abh06t:509_0: Maggo aṭṭhasu cittesu, mato aṭṭhaṅgikoti hi;
tika-abh06t:512_0: Balāni dve dvicittesu, ekasmiṃ tīṇi dīpaye;
tika-abh06t:516_0: Cittamevaṃ tu viññeyyaṃ, sabalaṃ abalampi ca.
tika-abh06t:533_0: Puññāpuññavipākā hi, kāme dasa ca pañca ca;
tika-abh06t:540_0: Sabbaṃ vuttapakāraṃ tu, tividhaṃ hoti mānasaṃ.
tika-abh06t:542_0: Sabbo kāmavipāko ca, rūpe pañcadasāpi ca;
tika-abh06t:554_0: Viññāṇāni ca dvepañca, aṭṭha lokuttarāni ca;
tika-abh06t:576_0: Evañcāpi hi taṃ cittaṃ, hoti sabbaṃ catubbidhaṃ.
tika-abh06t:579_0: Tathā dasa kriyā kāme, abhiññāmānasaṃ dvayaṃ.
tika-abh06t:582_0: Janayanti ca viññattiṃ, ime dvattiṃsa mānasā.
tika-abh06t:584_0: Kusalā ca kriyā ceva, te mahaggatamānasā;
tika-abh06t:588_0: Copanaṃ na ca pāpenti, dvikiccā niyatā ime.
tika-abh06t:590_0: Ṭhapetvā dasa viññāṇe, vipākā dvīsu bhūmisu;
tika-abh06t:597_0: Na karonti tikiccāni, ime soḷasa mānasā.
tika-abh06t:621_0: Idaṃ dviṭṭhānikaṃ nāma, hoti cittadvayaṃ pana.
tika-abh06t:639_0: Tikiccaṃ navakaṃ dve tu, dvikiccā sesamekakaṃ.
tika-abh06t:644_0: Chabbidhaṃ hoti taṃ channaṃ, viññāṇānaṃ pabhedato;
tika-abh06t:651_0: Rūpārammaṇikā dve tu, dve dve saddādigocarā.
tika-abh06t:671_0: Dhātudvayaṃ tidhā katvā, pacchimaṃ puna paṇḍito;
tika-abh06t:687_0: Bahudhā panidaṃ cittaṃ, hotīti ca vibhāvaye.
tika-abh06t:702_0: Gatiyo pañca niddiṭṭhā, satthunā tu tayo bhavā.
tika-abh06t:704_0: Bhūmiyo tattha tiṃseva, tāsu tiṃseva puggalā;
tika-abh06t:705_0: Bhūmīsvetāsu uppannā, sabbe ca pana puggalā.
tika-abh06t:714_0: Idha cittādhikārattā, acittā na ca uddhaṭā.
tika-abh06t:722_0: Tiṃsabhūmīsu cittāni, kati jāyanti me vada;
tika-abh06t:723_0: Cuddaseva tu cittāni, honti sabbāsu bhūmisu.
tika-abh06t:725_0: Sadā vīsati cittāni, kāmeyeva bhave siyuṃ;
tika-abh06t:735_0: Cittāni pana jāyanti, cha ca chabbīsabhūmisu.
tika-abh06t:749_0: Arūpe ca apāye ca, ṭhapetvā aṭṭha bhūmiyo;
tika-abh06t:752_0: Suddhāvāse apāye ca, ṭhapetvā nava bhūmiyo;
tika-abh06t:759_0: Ṭhapetvā pana sabbāpi, bhūmiyo hi mahaggatā.
tika-abh06t:762_0: Aṭṭha cittāni jāyante, sadā sattasu bhūmisu.
tika-abh06t:765_0: Cattāri pana cittāni, tīsu tīsveva bhūmisu.
tika-abh06t:779_0: Neva jāyanti jāyanti, asīti hadayā sadā.
tika-abh06t:785_0: Imehi saha cittehi, tayo maggā phaladvayaṃ.
tika-abh06t:788_0: Cattāro heṭṭhimā pākā, suddhāvāse na labbhare.
tika-abh06t:793_0: Domanassādimaggo ca, kriyā ca dve ahetukā;
tika-abh06t:810_0: Sabbe mahaggatā ceva, sabbepi ca anāsavā;
tika-abh06t:811_0: Tihetukā vipākā ca, kāme nava kriyāpi ca.
tika-abh06t:813_0: Duhetuno na jāyanti, cattālīsaṃ tathāṭṭha ca;
tika-abh06t:832_0: Dutiyaṃ ca phalaṃ hitvā, yāni cittāni tāniti;
tika-abh06t:835_0: Kati cittāni jāyante, kāme arahato pana;
tika-abh06t:839_0: Maggacittaṃ siyā tesaṃ, ekacittakkhaṇā hi te.
tika-abh06t:848_0: Aṭṭhārasa kriyā ceva, aṭṭha lokuttarāni ca.
tika-abh06t:851_0: Etāni catupaññāsa, cittāni na ca labbhare.
tika-abh06t:890_0: Tathā vehapphale cāpi, sabbesaṃ honti mānasā.
tika-abh06t:910_0: Honti tevīsa cittāni, iti vatvā vibhāvaye;
tika-abh06t:958_0: Ādimaggo tayo pākā, āruppā ca tathūpari;
tika-abh06t:967_0: Attano attano pākā, cattāro ca anāsavā;
tika-abh06t:971_0: Catassopi ca āruppā, teraseva kriyā siyuṃ.
tika-abh06t:1009_0: Tiṇṇaṃ puthujjanānaṃ tu, pañceva pana jāyare;
tika-abh06t:1013_0: Ekameva bhave tesaṃ, iti vatvā vibhāvaye.
tika-abh06t:1015_0: Mayā bhavesu cittānaṃ, puggalānaṃ vasena ca;
tika-abh06t:1029_0: Sadā sādhu cinteti vāceti yo taṃ,
tika-abh06t:1037_0: Dassayissāmahaṃ tena, vinā natthi hi sambhavo.
tika-abh06t:1039_0: Rūpaṃ saddaṃ gandhaṃ rasaṃ, phoṭṭhabbaṃ dhammameva ca;
tika-abh06t:1069_0: Te dhammārammaṇā honti, yesaṃ rūpādayo kira.
tika-abh06t:1072_0: Neva paccanubhontānaṃ, mano tesaṃ tu gocaraṃ.
tika-abh06t:1080_0: Yaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ hontaṃ, taṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ kathaṃ;
tika-abh06t:1081_0: Evaṃ sati panetesaṃ, niyamoti kathaṃ bhave.
tika-abh06t:1095_0: Nārūpaṃ na ca paññattiṃ, nātītaṃ na canāgataṃ;
tika-abh06t:1096_0: Ārammaṇaṃ karonte ca, vattamāno hi gocaro.
tika-abh06t:1125_0: Yāni vuttāvasesāni, cittāni pana tāni hi;
tika-abh06t:1147_0: Kāmato ca kriyā pañca, rūpato pañcamī kriyā;
tika-abh06t:1151_0: Sakkonti gocaraṃ kātuṃ, kati cittāni me vada.
tika-abh06t:1161_0: Cittesu pana sabbesu, kati cittāni me vada;
tika-abh06t:1164_0: Sabbesu pana cittesu, cha ca cittāni me suṇa;
tika-abh06t:1168_0: Kriyābhiññā manodhātu, cha ca sakkonti gocaraṃ.
tika-abh06t:1171_0: Nārahattaṃ phalaṃ maggaṃ, kātuṃ sakkonti gocaraṃ.
tika-abh06t:1174_0: Puthujjanā vā sekkhā vā, na sakkonti hi jānituṃ.
tika-abh06t:1196_0: Etesaṃ pana rāsīnaṃ, channaṃ ārammaṇaṃ siyā.
tika-abh06t:1199_0: Pañcannaṃ pana rāsīnaṃ, honti ārammaṇāni hi.
tika-abh06t:1210_0: Catunnaṃ pana rāsīnaṃ, hoti ārammaṇaṃ sadā;
tika-abh06t:1237_0: Yaṃ kriyāmānasaṃ rūpe, kāmapākaṃ tato vinā;
tika-abh06t:1238_0: Pañcannaṃ pana rāsīnaṃ, hoti ārammaṇaṃ pana.
tika-abh06t:1261_0: Rūpārammaṇikā dve tu, dve dve saddhādigocarā;
tika-abh06t:1277_0: Na puññassa na pākassa, hoti ārammaṇaṃ pana.
tika-abh06t:1283_0: Kusalaṃ kusalassāpi, vipākassa ca taṃ siyā.
tika-abh06t:1286_0: Ārammaṇaṃ tidhā hoti, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā.
tika-abh06t:1288_0: Kriyassāpi kriyā hoti, kusalampi kriyassa ca;
tika-abh06t:1289_0: Kusalaṃ tu vipākassa, evaṃ hoti tidhā pana.
tika-abh06t:1292_0: Evameva dvidhā ceva, tidhā cārammaṇaṃ siyā.
tika-abh06t:1314_0: Tīsu dvāresu kammāni, vipākā chasu dissare.
tika-abh06t:1317_0: Taṃ taṃ paccayamāgamma, dadāti vividhaṃ phalaṃ.
tika-abh06t:1325_0: Duhetukaṃ tu yaṃ kammaṃ, taṃ na deti tihetukaṃ;
tika-abh06t:1365_0: Yadā hi dutiyaṃ cittaṃ, kusalaṃ javanaṃ tadā;
tika-abh06t:1371_0: Yadā hi tatiyaṃ puññaṃ, javanaṃ hoti tena ca;
tika-abh06t:1375_0: Iminā pana saddhiṃ cha, purimāni ca pañcapi.
tika-abh06t:1377_0: Yadā catutthaṃ kusalaṃ, javanaṃ hoti tena ca;
tika-abh06t:1378_0: Tulyaṃ catutthaṃ pākaṃ tu, tadārammaṇataṃ vaje.
tika-abh06t:1381_0: Purimāni cha pākāni, iminā honti satta tu.
tika-abh06t:1410_0: Kamme āyūhite tesaṃ, vipākehi ca tīhipi;
tika-abh06t:1411_0: Eseva ca nayo tehi, dinnāya paṭisandhiyā.
tika-abh06t:1416_0: Dassetabbā tappacchā tu, iṭṭhasmiṃ gocare idha;
tika-abh06t:1417_0: Ekekasmiṃ pana dvāre, dvādasa dvādaseva tu.
tika-abh06t:1423_0: Bhavatīti ayaṃ vāro, vutto ettāvatā mayā.
tika-abh06t:1425_0: Sandhimekaṃ tu kammekaṃ, janeti na tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t:1428_0: Ekasmā hi yathā bījā, jāyate ekamaṅkuraṃ;
tika-abh06t:1432_0: Hotīti hi ayaṃ vāro, anupubbena āgato.
tika-abh06t:1437_0: Tena tulyena pākena, gahitā paṭisandhi ce;
tika-abh06t:1459_0: Imāni ca bhavaṅgāni, cakkhudvāre panaṭṭha hi.
tika-abh06t:1474_0: Hotītipi ayaṃ vāro, vutto ettāvatā mayā.
tika-abh06t:1477_0: Hotīti ca ayaṃ vāro, anupubbena āgato.
tika-abh06t:1485_0: Paṭisandhi na vattabbā, sā kammasadisāti hi;
tika-abh06t:1507_0: Purimāni ca tīṇīti, cattārova bhavanti hi.
tika-abh06t:1509_0: Evaṃ cattāri cittāni, dvāresupi ca pañcasu;
tika-abh06t:1518_0: Jātā sugatiyaṃ yena, pākena paṭisandhi tu;
tika-abh06t:1519_0: Tena tulyampi hīnaṃ vā, tadārammaṇakaṃ bhave.
tika-abh06t:1524_0: Thero nerayikānaṃ tu, dhammaṃ deseti vassati;
tika-abh06t:1525_0: Gandhaṃ vāyuñca māpeti, yadā tesaṃ tadā pana.
tika-abh06t:1527_0: Theraṃ disvā ca sutvā ca, dhammaṃ gandhañca ghāyataṃ;
tika-abh06t:1528_0: Pivatañca jalaṃ vāyuṃ, phusataṃ mudumeva ca.
tika-abh06t:1537_0: Kusalaṃ pana sandhāya, taṃ vuttanti hi dīpitaṃ.
tika-abh06t:1573_0: Na hoti kiṃ nu kātabbaṃ, vada tvaṃ ābhidhammika.
tika-abh06t:1578_0: Āvajjanaṃ kimassāti, natthi taṃ jāyate kathaṃ;
tika-abh06t:1582_0: Phalacittassa vā evaṃ, natthi āvajjanaṃ kira.
tika-abh06t:1587_0: Vinā ārammaṇeneva, na hi jāyati mānasaṃ;
tika-abh06t:1591_0: Cittassa ca niyāmoti, ñeyyā pañca niyāmatā.
tika-abh06t:1600_0: Vipākaṃ tu yato deti, ayaṃ kammaniyāmatā.
tika-abh06t:1617_0: Idāni pana sabbesaṃ, etesaṃ mānasaṃ mayā;
tika-abh06t:1627_0: Gantvā suttānusārena, yūsaṃ pivati tassa sā.
tika-abh06t:1633_0: Cittaṃ pana ca daṭṭhabbaṃ, majjhe makkaṭako viya.
tika-abh06t:1650_0: Idaṃ tu pana opammaṃ, atthaṃ dīpeti kiṃ tu hi;
tika-abh06t:1654_0: Tato hi paṭhamaṃyeva, jāyatīti hi dīpitaṃ.
tika-abh06t:1662_0: Khago yathā hi rukkhagge, nilīyantova sākhino;
tika-abh06t:1663_0: Sākhaṃ ghaṭṭeti tassīdha, chāyā pharati bhūmiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t:1668_0: Evameva ca rūpassa, pasādassa ca ghaṭṭanaṃ;
tika-abh06t:1726_0: Bhavaṃ tu pañcavokāraṃ, sandhāya kathito pana.
tika-abh06t:1729_0: Kāme dasa ca rūpesu, pañca cattārirūpisu.
tika-abh06t:1737_0: Aṭṭheva ca mahāpākā, tīṇi santīraṇāni ca;
tika-abh06t:1744_0: Kāme rūpe bhave ceva, hoti santīraṇattayaṃ.
tika-abh06t:1750_0: Kasmā na hoti ce tattha, bījassābhāvato pana.
tika-abh06t:1753_0: Rūpādigocare tassa, bhaveyya janakaṃ tu yaṃ.
tika-abh06t:1768_0: Hutvā vattanti te cāpi, idaṃ nevānubandhati.
tika-abh06t:1773_0: Kiṃ tena yuttivādena, vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu hi;
tika-abh06t:1785_0: Tathā mahaggate dhamme, ārabbha javane pana;
tika-abh06t:1792_0: Kathaṃ bhavaṅgato hoti, vuṭṭhānaṃ pana cetaso.
tika-abh06t:1795_0: Ghaṭṭanāya vinā tasmā, cittānaṃ hoti sambhavo.
tika-abh06t:1803_0: Kriyacittesu sabbesu, javanaṃ na ca hoti yaṃ;
tika-abh06t:1810_0: Yo dhammo yassa dhammassa, ṭhitiyuppattiyāpi vā.
tika-abh06t:1812_0: Upakāro hi so tassa, paccayoti pavuccati;
tika-abh06t:1816_0: Hetūti pana so dhammo, viññātabbo vibhāvinā.
tika-abh06t:1829_0: Na hi te pana rūpānaṃ, sādhenti kusalādikaṃ;
tika-abh06t:1830_0: Na tesaṃ pana rūpānaṃ, paccayā na ca honti te.
tika-abh06t:1862_0: Chando cittañca vīriyaṃ, vīmaṃsā cāti satthunā;
tika-abh06t:1865_0: Chandaṃ tu jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā, chandaṃ katvā dhuraṃ pana;
tika-abh06t:1868_0: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, sesesupi ca tīsupi;
tika-abh06t:1886_0: Tayo bhavā catasso ca, yoniyo gatipañcakaṃ;
tika-abh06t:1893_0: Dvedhā hi paccayā tesaṃ, bhavanti paṭisandhiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t:1901_0: Aṭṭhannaṃ tu parittānaṃ, kāme duggatiyaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t:1902_0: Pavatte paccayā honti, na honti paṭisandhiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t:1913_0: Channaṃ pana pavatteva, honti no paṭisandhiyaṃ;
tika-abh06t:1916_0: Kāme sugatiyaṃ tesaṃ, sattannampi tatheva ca;
tika-abh06t:1917_0: Pavatte paccayā honti, na honti paṭisandhiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t:1920_0: Pavatte paccayā honti, na honti paṭisandhiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t:1929_0: Yathā ca paccayā honti, tathā ñeyyā vibhāvinā.
tika-abh06t:1931_0: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, yoniādīsu tatridaṃ;
tika-abh06t:1935_0: Datvāna paṭisandhiṃ tu, sabbapākaṃ janeti so.
tika-abh06t:1955_0: Ekissā yoniyā ceva, ekissā gatiyāpi ca.
tika-abh06t:1958_0: Catunnaṃ pākacittānaṃ, dvedhā so hoti paccayo.
tika-abh06t:1967_0: Tato hetuṃ vinā tassa, pātubhāvo na vijjati.
tika-abh06t:1973_0: Na ca satto na ca jīvo, na attā vāpi vijjati.
tika-abh06t:1984_0: Vatthusannissitaṃ cittaṃ, hoti tasmiṃ khaṇepi ca;
tika-abh06t:1991_0: Taṇhā nameti saṅkhārā, khipanti sahajā pana.
tika-abh06t:1993_0: Na mīyamānaṃ taṇhāya, taṃ santativasā pana;
tika-abh06t:2000_0: Purimaṃ cavanaṃ ettha, pacchimaṃ paṭisandhi tu.
tika-abh06t:2003_0: Kammādiñca vinā hetuṃ, pātubhūtaṃ na ceva taṃ.
tika-abh06t:2005_0: Ettha cetassa cittassa, purimā bhavato pana;
tika-abh06t:2017_0: Athāpi pana ekanta-nānatā sā bhaveyya ce;
tika-abh06t:2018_0: Khīrasāmī naro neva, dadhisāmī bhaveyya so.
tika-abh06t:2027_0: Paratthāgamato ceva, idha tassa katassa hi.
tika-abh06t:2029_0: Aññassa aññato ceva, kammato taṃ phalaṃ siyā;
tika-abh06t:2030_0: Tasmā na sundaraṃ etaṃ, vidhānaṃ sabbameva ca.
tika-abh06t:2033_0: Santāne yaṃ phalaṃ etaṃ, nāññassa na ca aññato;
tika-abh06t:2036_0: Ekasmiṃ pana santāne, vattamānaṃ phalaṃ pana;
tika-abh06t:2037_0: Aññassātipi vā neva, aññato vā na hoti taṃ.
tika-abh06t:2043_0: Madhuro phalaso tassa, hoti kālantare pana.
tika-abh06t:2045_0: Na hi tāni hi bījāni, abhisaṅkharaṇampi vā;
tika-abh06t:2051_0: Evaṃ santepi taṃ kammaṃ, vijjamānampi vā pana;
tika-abh06t:2057_0: Atha vāvijjamānaṃ taṃ, niruddhaṃ paccayo bhave;
tika-abh06t:2061_0: Kaṭattā paccayo kammaṃ, tasmā niccaphalaṃ na ca;
tika-abh06t:2064_0: Kaṭattāyeva taṃ kammaṃ, phalassa pana paccayo;
tika-abh06t:2077_0: Yaṃ ruppatīti rūpanti, tathā rūpayatīti vā;
tika-abh06t:2091_0: Cakkhu sotañca ghānañca, jivhā kāyo ca rūpatā;
tika-abh06t:2103_0: Pathavī patthaṭattā ca, vāyo vāyanato bhave;
tika-abh06t:2104_0: Tejo tejeti rūpāni, āpo āpeti pālanā.
tika-abh06t:2107_0: Lakkhaṇādīsu ñātesu, dhammā āvi bhavanti hi.
tika-abh06t:2109_0: Sāmaññaṃ vā sabhāvo vā, dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ mataṃ;
tika-abh06t:2110_0: Kiccaṃ vā tassa sampatti, rasoti paridīpito.
tika-abh06t:2118_0: Tattha paññāmayaṃ cakkhu, hoti pañcavidhaṃ pana.
tika-abh06t:2138_0: Bahiddhā akkhilomehi, paricchinno ca yo pana;
tika-abh06t:2141_0: Sakalopi ca lokoyaṃ, kamalassa dalaṃ viya;
tika-abh06t:2142_0: Puthulaṃ vipulaṃ nīlaṃ, iti jānāti locanaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2144_0: Cakkhu nāma na taṃ hoti, vatthu tassāti vuccati;
tika-abh06t:2162_0: Cakkhu kāyappasādo ca, bhāvo jīvitameva ca;
tika-abh06t:2163_0: Cattālīsañca rūpāni, cattāri tu bhavanti hi.
tika-abh06t:2168_0: Yo panettha sito atthi, paribandho parittako;
tika-abh06t:2172_0: Tadetaṃ tassa majjhe tu, sasambhārassa cakkhuno.
tika-abh06t:2190_0: Sotādīsu ca eseva, nayo ñeyyo vibhāvinā;
tika-abh06t:2192_1: taṃ tanutambalomācite aṅgulivedhakasaṇṭhāne padese vuttappakārāhi dhātūhi katūpakāraṃ utucittāhārehi
tika-abh06t:2192_2: upatthambhiyamānaṃ āyunā paripāliyamānaṃ sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh06t:2193_1: taṃ sasambhāraghānabilassa anto ajapadasaṇṭhāne padese yathāvuttappakārā hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh06t:2194_2: sā sasambhārajivhāmajjhassa upari uppaladalaggasaṇṭhāne padese yathāvuttappakārā hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh06t:2195_1: Yāvatā pana imasmiṃ kāye upādinnakaṃ rūpaṃ atthi,
tika-abh06t:2195_2: sabbattha kāyapasādo kappāsapaṭale sneho viya yathāvuttappakāro hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh06t:2206_0: Te panevaṃ tu vattabbā, “suttaṃ āharathā”ti hi;
tika-abh06t:2207_0: Suttameva ca te addhā, na dakkhissanti kiñcipi.
tika-abh06t:2209_0: Visese sati bhūtānaṃ, pasādo hi kathaṃ bhave;
tika-abh06t:2216_0: Na hi bhūtavisesena, hoti tesaṃ visesatā.
tika-abh06t:2227_0: Yañcetaṃ itthiliṅgādi, na tu taṃ indriyaṃ siyā.
tika-abh06t:2232_0: Na ca taṃ cakkhuviññeyyaṃ, manoviññeyyameva taṃ;
tika-abh06t:2233_0: Itthiliṅgādayo cakkhuviññeyyā honti vā na vā.
tika-abh06t:2235_0: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, sesepi purisindriye;
tika-abh06t:2248_0: Evaṃ sante abhāvo ca, dutiyabyañjanassa tu.
tika-abh06t:2250_0: Na cābhāvo siyā kasmā, na taṃ byañjanakāraṇaṃ;
tika-abh06t:2251_0: Tassa kammasahāyaṃ hi, rāgacittaṃ tu kāraṇaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2264_0: Āhāratāti kabaḷīkāro āhāro. Ojaṭṭhamakaṃ rūpaṃ āharatīti āhāro.
tika-abh06t:2266_0: Yāya ojāya yāpenti, yattha yattha ca pāṇino;
tika-abh06t:2270_0: Kevalaṃ na ca sakkoti, pāletuṃ jīvitaṃ pana.
tika-abh06t:2272_0: Ojā sakkoti pāletuṃ, harituṃ na ca pācakaṃ;
tika-abh06t:2273_0: Haritumpi ca pāletuṃ, ubho sakkonti ekato.
tika-abh06t:2275_0: Kāyaviññattiniddese kāyena attano bhāvaṃ viññāpentānaṃ kāyaggahaṇānusārena gahitāya etāya bhāvo viññāyatīti viññatti.
tika-abh06t:2275_3: sādhu vācāya saṃvaro”ti āgato copanasaṅkhāto kāyova viññatti kāyaviññatti.
tika-abh06t:2275_4: Kāyavipphandanena adhippāyaviññāpanahetuttā sayañca tathā viññeyyattā kāyena viññattītipi kāyaviññatti.
tika-abh06t:2299_0: Saddo na cittajo atthi, vinā viññattighaṭṭanaṃ;
tika-abh06t:2302_0: Sā viññāpanato ceva, ayaṃ viññeyyatopi ca;
tika-abh06t:2305_0: Na viññattidvayaṃ aṭṭha, rūpāni viya cittajaṃ;
tika-abh06t:2309_0: Na kassatīti ākāso, rūpānaṃ vivaro pana;
tika-abh06t:2317_0: Etāsaṃ pana tissannaṃ, kamato ca pavattiyaṃ;
tika-abh06t:2320_0: Kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, lahutādittayaṃ pana;
tika-abh06t:2324_4: Etā pana tissopi na aññamaññaṃ vijahanti.
tika-abh06t:2327_0: Rūpānamācayo yo hi, vutto upacayoti so;
tika-abh06t:2350_0: Tattha samodhānanti sabbameva idaṃ rūpaṃ sabbasamodhānato pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātu cakkhāyatanaṃ…pe…
tika-abh06t:2350_3: Keci pana middhavādino “middharūpaṃ nāma atthī”ti vadanti,
tika-abh06t:2350_5: natthi nīvaraṇā tavā”ti ca “thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ avijjānīvaraṇañca nīvaraṇasampayutta”nti sampayuttavacanato
tika-abh06t:2350_6: ca mahāpakaraṇapaṭṭhāne “nīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā”ti arūpepi
tika-abh06t:2354_4: Tepi tesaṃ visuṃ visuṃ abhāvaṃ dassetvā paṭikkhipitabbā.
tika-abh06t:2358_0: Kammaṃ utu ca cittañca, āhāro rūpahetuyo;
tika-abh06t:2359_0: Eteheva ca rūpāni, jāyanti na panaññato.
tika-abh06t:2367_0: Cittena utunā ceva, saddo dvīhi samuṭṭhito;
tika-abh06t:2380_0: Kammena vīsati rūpā, sattarasa tu cetasā;
tika-abh06t:2389_0: Evaṃ sante tu tesampi, pākabhedā siyuṃ na hi;
tika-abh06t:2390_0: Pāko paccati bhedo vā, na ca bhijjati natthi taṃ.
tika-abh06t:2398_0: Na ceva jāyate jāti, iti ñeyyā vibhāvinā;
tika-abh06t:2401_0: Tattha yathā siyā jāti, yesaṃ dhammānameva sā;
tika-abh06t:2404_0: Labhateva tathā tesaṃ, pākabhedā labbhanti te;
tika-abh06t:2408_0: Na pākabhedā vohāraṃ, taṃ labhanti kadācipi.
tika-abh06t:2414_0: Tasmā labhati jāti ca, labhatī netaradvayaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2416_0: Jiyyatīti na vattabbaṃ, taṃ dvayaṃ bhijjatīti vā;
tika-abh06t:2420_0: Vuttattā jāyaticcetaṃ, atha maññasi ce tuvaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2422_0: Evampi ca na vattabbaṃ, sā hi pariyāyadesanā;
tika-abh06t:2426_0: Yadi evaṃ tayametaṃ, ajātattā ca sabbathā.
tika-abh06t:2428_0: Natthīti ce khaṃpupphaṃva, niccaṃ vāsaṅkhataṃ viya;
tika-abh06t:2432_0: Tasmā hi ca khaṃpupphaṃva, na natthi pana taṃ tayaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2435_0: Tasmā na pana niccaṃ vā, nibbānaṃ viya taṃ tayaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2439_0: Yadi honti anipphannā, bhaveyyuṃ te asaṅkhatā.
tika-abh06t:2442_0: Kathaṃ nāma bhaveyyuṃ te, nipphannā ceva saṅkhatā.
tika-abh06t:2449_0: Evaṃ sante tu dhammānaṃ, hoti saṅkaradosatā;
tika-abh06t:2452_0: Aññaṃ pana ca aññasmiṃ, na catthi paramatthato;
tika-abh06t:2456_0: Tesaṃ ṭhānantaraṃ vattuṃ, na sakkā samayaññunā.
tika-abh06t:2464_0: Tasmā hi pana dhammānaṃ, aññamaññaṃ vimissatā;
tika-abh06t:2484_0: Sesāni pana rūpāni, sukhumāni tu soḷasa;
tika-abh06t:2487_10: nakutoci jātaṃ nevakammajānākammajaṃ jaratā aniccatā ca.
tika-abh06t:2488_4: neva dvārañca na vatthu cāti evaṃ bhedato ca,
tika-abh06t:2488_8: neva dvārañca nevindriyañcāti evaṃ bhedato ca,
tika-abh06t:2488_12: nevindriyaṃ na vatthu ceti evaṃ bhedato ca catubbidhaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2489_10: sesaṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ neva dvāraṃ na vatthu ca.
tika-abh06t:2489_11: Tatiyacatukke indriyameva hutvā na dvāranti itthindriyapurisindriyajīvitindriyāni.
tika-abh06t:2490_2: dvārameva hutvā nevindriyaṃ na vatthu ca,
tika-abh06t:2490_4: indriyameva hutvā na vatthu na dvārañca,
tika-abh06t:2490_5: nevindriyaṃ na vatthu na dvārañcāti evaṃ pabhedato pañcavidhaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2496_0: Saddo eko dvijo nāma, lahutādittayaṃ tijaṃ;
tika-abh06t:2502_0: Viññattīnaṃ dvayaṃ dvāraṃ, nevindriyaṃ na vatthu ca;
tika-abh06t:2503_0: Hadayavatthu vatthūva, na dvāraṃ nevindriyaṃ pana.
tika-abh06t:2504_0: Itthipurisajīvitindriyāni indriyameva na vatthu na dvārañca,
tika-abh06t:2504_1: sesaṃ pana rūpaṃ nevindriyaṃ na vatthu na dvāranti.
tika-abh06t:2506_6: Dutiyachakke cakkhuviññeyyaṃ nāma cakkhuviññāṇena viññeyyaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ…pe…
tika-abh06t:2506_8: manoviññeyyaṃ nāma sesā pañca oḷārikā ca soḷasa sukhumarūpāni cāti ekavīsatividhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh06t:2507_1: cakkhuviññeyyaṃ sotaghānajivhākāyaviññeyyaṃ manodhātuviññeyyaṃ manoviññāṇadhātuviññeyyanti sattavidhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh06t:2508_0: Tattha cakkhādipañcavatthūni hadayavatthunā saddhiṃ cha vatthūni,
tika-abh06t:2509_1: Tattha cakkhudvārādīni pañca kāyaviññattivacīviññattidvārehi saddhiṃ satta dvārāni,
tika-abh06t:2519_0: Yoniyo purimā tisso, na santīti viniddise.
tika-abh06t:2531_0: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, sabbesu dasakesupi.
tika-abh06t:2539_0: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, saddhiṃ bhāvena vatthunā;
tika-abh06t:2540_0: Cakkhādīhi ca yojetvā, dasakā satta viññunā.
tika-abh06t:2545_0: Cakkhu sotañca ghānañca, jivhā kāyo ca vatthu ca;
tika-abh06t:2546_0: Bhāvo cāti hi sattannaṃ, dasakānaṃ vasā pana.
tika-abh06t:2549_0: Dasakāni ca tīṇeva, navakaṃ jīvitassa ca.
tika-abh06t:2551_0: Catunnaṃ tu kalāpānaṃ, vasena pana rūpinaṃ;
tika-abh06t:2566_0: Ghānaṃ jivhā ca kāyo ca, tathā bhāvadvayampi ca;
tika-abh06t:2567_0: Brahmānaṃ pana rūpīnaṃ, pañca rūpā na vijjare.
tika-abh06t:2572_0: Rūpaṃ nibbattamānaṃ tu, sabbesaṃ pana pāṇinaṃ;
tika-abh06t:2578_0: Yatheva tassa uppāde, tiṃsa rūpāni jāyare;
tika-abh06t:2584_0: Rogato gaṇḍato rūpaṃ, parato ca palokato;
tika-abh06t:2585_0: Disvāna dukkhato rūpaṃ, rūpe chandaṃ virājaye.
tika-abh06t:2601_0: Tattha nibbānanti bhavābhavaṃ vinanato vānaṃ vuccati taṇhā,
tika-abh06t:2601_1: vānato nikkhantattā nibbānanti ca pavuccati amataṃ asaṅkhataṃ paramaṃ sukhaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2601_2: Vuttaṃ hetaṃ “yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbāna”nti.
tika-abh06t:2605_0: Etaṃ ca nibbānaṃ nāma tayidaṃ santilakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh06t:2606_1: na paramatthato nibbānaṃ nāma eko sabhāvo atthi,
tika-abh06t:2606_4: paññācakkhunā upaparikkhiyamānānaṃ hitagavesīnaṃ yathānurūpāya paṭipattiyā upalabbhanīyato.
tika-abh06t:2606_7: Athāyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā “katamaṃ nu kho, āvuso,
tika-abh06t:2606_9: rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo”ti rāgādīnaṃ khayova dassito,
tika-abh06t:2606_10: tasmā rāgādīnaṃ khayamattameva nibbānanti ce? Taṃ na. Kasmā?
tika-abh06t:2606_14: rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo”ti rāgādīnaṃ khayova vutto,
tika-abh06t:2606_15: tasmā tava matena arahattaphalassāpi rāgādīnaṃ khayamattatā bhaveyya,
tika-abh06t:2606_16: na cetaṃ yuttaṃ anuttarassa lokuttaraphalacittassa rāgānaṃ khayamattatāpajjanaṃ,
tika-abh06t:2607_0: Yassa pana dhammassādhigamena rāgādīnaṃ khayo hoti,
tika-abh06t:2607_1: so dhammo rāgādīnaṃ khayassa upanissayattā akkhayopi samāno “rāgādīnaṃ khayo nibbāna”nti khayopacārena vutto,
tika-abh06t:2607_2: “tipusaṃ jaro guḷo semho”tiādīsu viya phalūpacārena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2607_8: Evañhi sati rāgādikkhayānaṃ bahubhāvato nibbānassāpi bahubhāvo bhaveyya,
tika-abh06t:2608_5: Kiṃ pana rāgādayo gotrabhuādīnaṃ khaṇe khīyanti,
tika-abh06t:2608_17: Evaṃ sante bhavato matena phalameva khayārammaṇaṃ, na itare,
tika-abh06t:2608_19: Addhā so ārammaṇaṃ apassanto niruttaro bhavissati.
tika-abh06t:2608_22: Nibbānaṃ pana na kenaci karīyati na uppādīyati,
tika-abh06t:2614_11: Yaṃ kho pana kiñci bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ,
tika-abh06t:2614_13: Evaṃ vuttassa tassa nibbānassa abhāvapattidosato paṭhamajjhānākāsānañcāyatanānampi abhāvo bhaveyya,
tika-abh06t:2615_3: ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhata”nti ca dhammasāminā tathāgatena sammāsambuddhena anekesu suttantesu paramatthavasena
tika-abh06t:2615_4: vuttattā “atthi nibbānaṃ nāma eko dhammo”ti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2615_6: “cattāro maggā apariyāpannā cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni nibbānañca,
tika-abh06t:2615_7: ime dhammā appamāṇā”ti vuttattā rāgādīnaṃ khayassa appamāṇattaṃ kathaṃ yujjati,
tika-abh06t:2615_8: tasmā paramatthato atthiyeva nibbānaṃ nāma eko sabhāvoti.
tika-abh06t:2615_10: titthiyānaṃ attā viya ca sasavisāṇaṃ viya ca nāvijjamānaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2616_3: Parittārammaṇattike ca pana “katame dhammā appamāṇārammaṇā”ti padamuddharitvā “cattāro maggā apariyāpannā cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni,
tika-abh06t:2616_8: “Navattabbārammaṇā pana rūpāvacarattikacatukkajjhānā kusalato ca vipākato ca kiriyato ca,
tika-abh06t:2616_10: ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ kusalato ca vipākato ca kiriyato ca,
tika-abh06t:2616_13: Yasmā ca paṇṇattibhāvo nibbānassa na yujjati,
tika-abh06t:2616_16: papañcābhāvato nippapañcaṃ nibbānaṃ nāma atthīti upagantabbanti.
tika-abh06t:2619_0: Paṇītaṃ saraṇaṃ khemaṃ, tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2628_0: Imehi pana nāmehi, nibbānaṃ tu kathīyati.
tika-abh06t:2630_0: Evañca pana viññāya, nibbānampi ca accutaṃ;
tika-abh06t:2641_7: “yā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti byañjanaṃ abhilāpo”ti.
tika-abh06t:2641_18: “Aha”nti hi rūpādayo dhamme upādāya paṭicca kāraṇaṃ katvā yathā te rūpādayo dhammā uppādavayavanto,
tika-abh06t:2641_20: kevalaṃ lokasaṅketena siddhā yā ayaṃ “aha”nti kathīyati ceva paññāpīyati ca,
tika-abh06t:2642_1: Tattha nāmanti taṃ taṃ dhammaṃ “esa itthannāmo nāmā”ti paññapeti,
tika-abh06t:2643_0: Sā panesā tajjāpaññatti upādāpaññatti upanidhāpaññattīti tividhā hoti.
tika-abh06t:2643_3: Tattha samūhapaññatti nāma rūpārūpadhammesu ekassa vā bahūnaṃ vā nāmaṃ gahetvā samūhamevopādāya vuccati. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh06t:2644_0: Yadā pana sā vijjamānaṃ paramatthaṃ jotayati,
tika-abh06t:2644_12: Tattha paramatthato vijjamānānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ paññāpanā vijjamānapaññatti.
tika-abh06t:2644_14: Ṭhapetvā pana vacanatthaṃ kenaci ākārena anupalabbhamānānaṃ pañcamasaccādīnaṃ,
tika-abh06t:2644_23: bhikkhukumāro”ti evamādikā avijjamānena avijjamānapaññattīti evaṃ vuttā cha paññattiyopi ettheva saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh06t:2645_2: rassaṃ upanidhāya dīgho”tiādinayappavattā “kapaṇaṃ mānusakaṃ rajjaṃ dibbasukhaṃ upanidhāyā”ti evamādikā ca,
tika-abh06t:2645_3: tasmā paññapetabbato ca paññāpanato ca paññattīti veditabbā.
tika-abh06t:2647_0: Paramatthato ca paññatti, tatiyā koṭi na vijjati;
tika-abh06t:2648_0: Dvīsu ṭhānesu kusalo, paravādesu na kampati.
tika-abh06t:2653_3: Tassa hi kārakassa vedakassa attano abhāve kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhāvo siyā,
tika-abh06t:2653_14: Tathā kusalādīnampi asatipi kattari atthitā upagantabbā,
tika-abh06t:2653_17: Athāpi yathā pana loke kārakābhāvepi pathavīāpatejautuādayo paṭicca aṅkurādīnaṃ abhinibbatti dissati,
tika-abh06t:2653_18: tathā etesampi kusalādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ hetupaccayasāmaggiyā abhinibbatti hotīti veditabbā.
tika-abh06t:2654_0: Athāpi cettha tassā paññāya parikappito nicco dhuvo kusalādīnaṃ kattā attā paramatthato atthīti ce?
tika-abh06t:2654_2: so pana tāva attā kārako vedako kiṃ sacetano vā,
tika-abh06t:2655_1: attano pana nāso na bhavati niccattā,
tika-abh06t:2655_3: attano anāse sati cetanāyapi nāso na bhavati.
tika-abh06t:2655_6: Cetanattānaṃ anaññatte sati cetanāyayeva nāso bhavati,
tika-abh06t:2655_11: Atha cetanāya nāse attano nāso na bhavatīti ce?
tika-abh06t:2655_13: Atha aññassa attassa nāse sati sayaṃ nāso na bhavati,
tika-abh06t:2655_14: evañca sati “cetanāya anañño attā”ti tava paṭiññā hīnā.
tika-abh06t:2655_15: Athāpi cetanattānaṃ anaññatte sati attano anāso cetanāyapi anāso bhavatu.
tika-abh06t:2655_21: Atha pana evaṃ na bhavatīti ce?
tika-abh06t:2656_0: Athāyaṃ bhavato adhippāyo siyā “nāyaṃ mama attā cetanāya anañño,
tika-abh06t:2656_3: idha pana aññattaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti lakkhaṇakatamaññattañca desantarakatamaññattañcāti.
tika-abh06t:2656_4: Tattha kiṃ tvaṃ cetanattānaṃ lakkhaṇakatamaññattaṃ vadesi,
tika-abh06t:2656_7: Yathā hi rūparasagandhādīnamekadese vattamānānampi lakkhaṇato aññattaṃ hoti,
tika-abh06t:2656_8: evaṃ cetanattānamekadese vattamānānampi lakkhaṇato aññattaṃ hoti,
tika-abh06t:2656_11: yathā hi jātavedassa ḍayhamāne āmakasaṅghaṭe āmakavaṇṇavināse rasādīnaṃ vināso bhavati,
tika-abh06t:2656_12: tatheva cetanāya vināse attanopi vināso siyā.
tika-abh06t:2657_0: Athevaṃ bhavato mati siyā “ekadesatte satipi attano pana nāso na bhavati,
tika-abh06t:2657_6: Atha samāne ekadesatte avinibbhogabhāvepi kena hetunā cetanāya eva nāso bhavati,
tika-abh06t:2657_11: Atha cetanāya nāse attano nāso na bhavati,
tika-abh06t:2657_15: yathā rūparasagandhādīnaṃ ekadese vattamānānampi lakkhaṇato aññattaṃ,
tika-abh06t:2657_18: Atha rūparasādīnaṃ viya samānepi ekadesatte yadi attano anāse cetanāyapi anāso na bhavati,
tika-abh06t:2658_1: cetanattānaṃ aññatte sati ghaṭapaṭasakaṭagehādīnaṃ viya aññattaṃ siyā.
tika-abh06t:2658_2: Cetanāya vinā anaññatā te attā na ghaṭena vinā paṭo viya añño siyā.
tika-abh06t:2658_3: Añño ca hi ghaṭo añño ca paṭoti? Na,
tika-abh06t:2658_6: Tasmā paramatthato na koci kattā vā vedako vā attā atthīti daṭṭhabbanti.
tika-abh06t:2692_0: “Kiṃ nu sattoti paccesi, māra diṭṭhigataṃ nu te;
tika-abh06t:2699_8: Evaṃ asaṅkarato ñatvā koci kārako vā vedako vā nicco dhuvo attā paramatthato natthīti upaparikkhitvā
tika-abh06t:2699_9: paccayasāmaggiyā dhammānaṃ pavattiṃ sallakkhetvā paṇḍitena kulaputtena atthakāmena dukkhassantakiriyāya
tika-abh06t:2701_0: Yo imaṃ ganthaṃ accantaṃ, cinteti satatampi so;
tika-abh06t:2702_0: Kamena paramā paññā, tassa gacchati vepulaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2722_0: Natthi jhānaṃ kuto maggo, tasmā sīlaṃ visodhaye.
tika-abh06t:2730_0: Ratanaṃ saraṇaṃ khemaṃ, tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ;
tika-abh06t:2753_0: Piyo garu bhāvanīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
tika-abh06t:2754_0: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako.
tika-abh06t:2759_0: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetabbaṃ, vattaṃ katvā panassa tu;
tika-abh06t:2760_0: Tenāpi caritaṃ ñatvā, dātabbaṃ tassa bhikkhuno.
tika-abh06t:2766_0: Tehi attho na catthīti, na mayā idha dassitā.
tika-abh06t:2781_0: Ime pana ca cattāro, anukūlāti dīpitā.
tika-abh06t:2783_0: Cattāropi ca āruppā, sesāni kasiṇāni ca;
tika-abh06t:2814_0: Na ca vaḍḍhaniyā sesā, bhavanti asubhādayo.
tika-abh06t:2831_0: Catutthaṃ kasiṇaṃ hitvā, kasiṇā asubhāni ca;
tika-abh06t:2841_0: Upekkhā appamaññā ca, arūpā ceva pañcime.
tika-abh06t:2847_0: Kasiṇā nava honte ca, arūpānaṃ tu paccayā.
tika-abh06t:2849_0: Dasāpi kasiṇā honti, abhiññānaṃ tu paccayā;
tika-abh06t:2871_0: Dīghā kesā nakhā lomā, chinditabbā vibhāvinā.
tika-abh06t:2873_0: Cīvaraṃ rajitabbaṃ taṃ, kiliṭṭhaṃ tu sace siyā;
tika-abh06t:2874_0: Sace patte malaṃ hoti, pacitabbova suṭṭhu so.
tika-abh06t:2879_0: Vajjetvā mattikaṃ nīlaṃ, pītaṃ setañca lohitaṃ;
tika-abh06t:2886_0: Saṃhārimaṃ vā kātabbaṃ, taṃ tatraṭṭhakameva vā.
tika-abh06t:2889_0: Cammaṃ vā kaṭasāraṃ vā, dussapattampi vā tathā.
tika-abh06t:2895_0: Vallīhi taṃ vinandhitvā, kātabbaṃ kaṇṇikaṃ samaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2898_0: Vaṭṭaṃ vattati taṃ kātuṃ, vivaṭṭaṃ pana micchatā.
tika-abh06t:2901_0: Sammajjitvāna taṃ ṭhānaṃ, nhatvā āgamma paṇḍito.
tika-abh06t:2918_0: Na vaṇṇo pekkhitabbo so, daṭṭhabbaṃ na ca lakkhaṇaṃ;
tika-abh06t:2919_0: Vaṇṇaṃ pana amuñcitvā, ussadassa vasena hi.
tika-abh06t:2924_0: Pathavī medanī bhūmi, vasudhā ca vasundharā;
tika-abh06t:2928_0: Yāvuggahanimittaṃ tu, nuppajjati ca tāva so.
tika-abh06t:2933_0: Yathā ummīlitekāle, tathāpāthaṃ tu yāti ce;
tika-abh06t:2936_0: Nimitte pana sañjāte, tato pabhuti yoginā;
tika-abh06t:2937_0: Nisīditabbaṃ no cevaṃ, tasmiṃ ṭhāne vijānatā.
tika-abh06t:2946_0: Sace nassati taṃ ṭhānaṃ, gantvāvādāya taṃ pana.
tika-abh06t:2951_0: Nimittaṃ pana taṃ hitvā, cittaṃ dhāvati ce bahi;
tika-abh06t:2963_0: Ko panāyaṃ viseso hi, imassa purimassa vā;
tika-abh06t:2987_0: Dvinnaṃ pana samādhīnaṃ, kiṃ nānākaraṇaṃ pana;
tika-abh06t:2993_0: Pallaṅkena ca teneva, vaḍḍhetvā taṃ nimittakaṃ;
tika-abh06t:2994_0: Appanaṃ adhigantuṃ so, sakkoti yadi sundaraṃ.
tika-abh06t:3002_0: Nimittaṃ rakkhato laddhaṃ, parihāni na vijjati.
tika-abh06t:3005_0: Rakkhitabbaṃ hi tasmā taṃ, tatrāyaṃ rakkhaṇāvidhi.
tika-abh06t:3007_0: Āvāso gocaro bhassaṃ, puggalo bhojanaṃ utu;
tika-abh06t:3011_0: Na cireneva kālena, hoti bhikkhussa appanā.
tika-abh06t:3014_0: Appanāya ca kosallaṃ, sammā sampādaye budho.
tika-abh06t:3023_0: Tathāpi na jahe yogaṃ, vāyametheva paṇḍito.
tika-abh06t:3041_0: Javanāni ca jāyante, tassa cattāri pañca vā.
tika-abh06t:3050_0: Yaṃ taṃ sabbantimaṃ ettha, gotrabhūti pavuccati.
tika-abh06t:3059_0: Catutthaṃ pañcamaṃ vāti, appeti na tato paraṃ.
tika-abh06t:3061_0: Chaṭṭhe vā sattame vāpi, appanā neva jāyati;
tika-abh06t:3064_0: Purimehāsevanaṃ laddhā, chaṭṭhaṃ vā sattamampi vā;
tika-abh06t:3082_0: Kukkuccaṃ vicikicchā ca, pahīnā pañcime pana.
tika-abh06t:3084_0: Vitakkena vicārena, pītiyā ca sukhena ca;
tika-abh06t:3088_0: Ito cito bhamantassa, vane makkaṭako viya.
tika-abh06t:3118_0: Upacārampi vā patvā, vaḍḍhetuṃ tañca vattati.
tika-abh06t:3120_0: Appanaṃ pana patvā vā, tatrāyaṃ vaḍḍhanakkamo;
tika-abh06t:3136_0: Ubhato bhaṭṭhobhave yogī, paṭhamā dutiyāpi ca.
tika-abh06t:3142_0: Mandassa yogino jhānaṃ, hoti taṃ ṭhitibhāgiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t:3151_0: Paṭhamā paguṇato jhānā, vuṭṭhāya vidhinā tato.
tika-abh06t:3156_0: Iti ādīnavaṃ disvā, paṭhame pana yoginā;
tika-abh06t:3168_0: Thūlaṅgānaṃ pahānāya, tadā tassa ca yogino;
tika-abh06t:3178_0: Javanāni hi jāyante, tassa cattāri pañca vā.
tika-abh06t:3187_0: Evaṃ duvaṅgahīnaṃ tu, tīhi aṅgehi saṃyutaṃ.
tika-abh06t:3195_0: Tasmā paguṇato jhānā, vuṭṭhāya dutiyā puna;
tika-abh06t:3201_0: Tattha ādīnavaṃ disvā, tatiye santato pana;
tika-abh06t:3205_0: Athassa dutiyajjhānā, vuṭṭhāya ca yadā pana.
tika-abh06t:3210_0: Thūlaṅgānaṃ pahānāya, tadā tassa ca yogino;
tika-abh06t:3220_0: Javanāni ca jāyante, tassa cattāri pañca vā.
tika-abh06t:3225_0: Satiyā sampajaññena, sampannaṃ tu sukhena ca;
tika-abh06t:3237_0: Tasmā paguṇato jhānā, vuṭṭhāya tatiyā puna;
tika-abh06t:3243_0: Iti ādīnavaṃ disvā, jhānasmiṃ tatiye puna;
tika-abh06t:3244_0: Catutthaṃ santato disvā, cetasā pana yoginā.
tika-abh06t:3249_0: Athassa tatiyajjhānā, vuṭṭhāya hi yadā pana;
tika-abh06t:3252_0: Thūlato tassupaṭṭhāti, sukhaṃ taṃ mānasaṃ tato;
tika-abh06t:3259_0: Catutthaṃ panidaṃ jhānaṃ, uppajjissati taṃ iti.
tika-abh06t:3265_0: Javanāni ca jāyante, tassa cattāri pañca vā.
tika-abh06t:3280_0: Ayamettha viseso hi, sesaṃ vuttanayaṃ pana.
tika-abh06t:3282_0: Yaṃ catukkanaye jhānaṃ, dutiyaṃ taṃ dvidhā pana;
tika-abh06t:3285_0: Tatiyaṃ taṃ catutthañca, catutthaṃ pañcamaṃ idha;
tika-abh06t:3291_0: Sumadhuravarataravacano, kaṃ nu janaṃ neva rañjayati;
tika-abh06t:3313_0: Catutthe pana jhānasmiṃ, hutvā ciṇṇavasī vasī;
tika-abh06t:3319_0: Iti ādīnavaṃ disvā, catutthe tattha sabbaso;
tika-abh06t:3330_0: Ugghāṭento hi kasiṇaṃ, na saṃvelleti taṃ pana;
tika-abh06t:3331_0: Na cuddharati so yogī, pūvaṃ viya kapālato.
tika-abh06t:3333_0: Kevalaṃ pana taṃ neva, āvajjati na pekkhati;
tika-abh06t:3344_0: Āsevati ca bhāveti, taṃ nimittaṃ punappunaṃ;
tika-abh06t:3348_0: Idhāpi purime bhāge, tīṇi cattāri vā pana.
tika-abh06t:3371_0: Āsevati ca bhāveti, taṃ nimittaṃ punappunaṃ;
tika-abh06t:3375_0: Appeti appanā yasmiṃ, nayo vuttanayova so.
tika-abh06t:3392_0: Evaṃ manasi katvāna, kātabbo manasā puna;
tika-abh06t:3404_0: Āsevati ca bhāveti, taṃ nimittaṃ punappunaṃ;
tika-abh06t:3421_0: Sannipātaṃ yathā koci, disvā saṅghassa katthaci;
tika-abh06t:3422_0: Gate saṅghe tu taṃ ṭhānaṃ, suññamevānupassati.
tika-abh06t:3433_0: Evaṃ manasi katvāna, puna tattheva dhīmatā;
tika-abh06t:3442_0: Āsevati ca bhāveti, taṃ nimittaṃ punappunaṃ;
tika-abh06t:3460_0: Santato taṃ karonto hi, manasā sukhumaṃ paraṃ;
tika-abh06t:3475_0: Paṭusaññāya kiccaṃ sā, kātuṃ sakkoti neva ca.
tika-abh06t:3479_0: Tasmā pana ca sā saññā, “nāsaññā”ti pavuccati.
tika-abh06t:3518_0: Alaṅkāro hi tāṇanti, satthanti ca pavuccati.
tika-abh06t:3536_0: Vuṭṭhāya hi sataṃ vāpi, sahassaṃ vā yadicchati.
tika-abh06t:3562_0: Tassevaṃ pana saddassa, nimittaṃ manasi kubbato;
tika-abh06t:3568_0: Javanāni hi jāyante, tassa cattāri pañca vā;
tika-abh06t:3569_0: Purimānettha cittesu, tīṇi cattāri vā pana.
tika-abh06t:3574_0: Sahajātaṃ tu yaṃ ñāṇaṃ, appanāmānasena hi;
tika-abh06t:3577_0: Thāmajātaṃ karontena, taṃ ñāṇaṃ tena yoginā;
tika-abh06t:3588_0: Phuṭṭhokāsagate sadde, sabbe pana suṇāti so;
tika-abh06t:3595_0: Ālokaṃ pana vaḍḍhetvā, tasmā dibbena cakkhunā;
tika-abh06t:3596_0: Hadayaṃ pana nissāya, vattamānaṃ tu lohitaṃ.
tika-abh06t:3629_0: Yāva asmiṃ bhave sandhi, tāva tena ca bhikkhunā;
tika-abh06t:3639_0: Katvā javanacittāni, honti cattāri pañca vā;
tika-abh06t:3645_0: Tena cittena yaṃ ñāṇaṃ, saṃyuttaṃ tena yā pana;
tika-abh06t:3665_0: Passitabbaṃ bhave rūpaṃ, passato pana tassa taṃ.
tika-abh06t:3670_0: Tasmiṃ antarahite rūpa-gatampi ca na dissati;
tika-abh06t:3687_0: Manodvāre manakkāre, jāte yāni tadeva ca;
tika-abh06t:3688_0: Rūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā, jāyanti javanāni hi.
tika-abh06t:3727_0: Mahaggate ca cittasmiṃ, samāropeti so tadā;
tika-abh06t:3733_0: Pādakajjhānacittaṃ taṃ, kāye ropeti so tadā;
tika-abh06t:3751_0: Paccuppanno paritto ca, saddo ārammaṇaṃ yato;
tika-abh06t:3787_0: Yathā ca pupphamuṭṭhimhi, ukkhitte gagane pana;
tika-abh06t:3794_0: Tesaṃ dvinnaṃ sahaṭṭhānā-bhāvato taṃ na yujjati.
tika-abh06t:3797_0: Aniṭṭhe pana hi ṭhāne, ayuttanti pakāsitaṃ.
tika-abh06t:3800_0: Vasena paccuppannaṃ taṃ, hoti ārammaṇaṃ idaṃ.
tika-abh06t:3808_0: Ārammaṇaṃ tadā katvā, tena saddhiṃ nirujjhati;
tika-abh06t:3809_0: Javanāni hi jāyante, tassa cattāri pañca vā.
tika-abh06t:3814_0: Etesaṃ pana sabbesaṃ, niruddhaṃ tu tadeva ca;
tika-abh06t:3815_0: Cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti, tasmā sabbāni tānipi.
tika-abh06t:3821_0: Parassa cittaṃ jānāti, netarāni yathā pana.
tika-abh06t:3823_0: Cakkhudvāre tu viññāṇaṃ, rūpaṃ passati netaraṃ;
tika-abh06t:3824_0: Evameva ca taṃ iddhi-cittameva ca jānāti.
tika-abh06t:3838_0: Atīte attanā maggaṃ, bhāvitaṃ tu phalampi vā;
tika-abh06t:3845_0: Atītārammaṇā honti, kiñcāpi atha kho pana.
tika-abh06t:3863_0: Rūpaṃ saddoti dvinnaṃ tu, ayameva visesatā.
tika-abh06t:3880_0: Atha kho pana taṃ satta-divasabbhantaraṃ pana;
tika-abh06t:3881_0: Cittameva ca jānāti, na hi taṃ aññagocaraṃ.
tika-abh06t:3919_0: Bhāvetabbā yato paññā, bhikkhunā tena dhīmatā.
tika-abh06t:3930_0: Pajānātīti paññā sā, jānanā vā pakārato.
tika-abh06t:3936_0: Lakkhaṇappaṭivedhaṃ tu, kātuṃ sakkoti neva sā.
tika-abh06t:3941_0: Ussakkitvā na sakkoti, maggaṃ pāpetumeva taṃ;
tika-abh06t:3942_0: Paññā vuttanayaṃ kātuṃ, sakkoti tividhampi taṃ.
tika-abh06t:3965_0: Parato pana sutvāna, laddhā paññā ayaṃ idha;
tika-abh06t:3966_0: Suteneva ca nipphannā, paññā sutamayā matā.
tika-abh06t:3968_0: Yathā vāpi tathā cettha, bhāvanāya vasena tu;
tika-abh06t:3974_0: Yaṃ kiñci paccayuppannaṃ, vipākā ca kriyā tathā;
tika-abh06t:3980_0: Tasmiṃ atthe ca dhamme ca, yā sabhāvanirutti tu;
tika-abh06t:3984_0: Tesu ñāṇesu yaṃ ñāṇaṃ, paṭibhānanti taṃ mataṃ.
tika-abh06t:3999_0: Rūpañca vedanā saññā, saṅkhārā ceva sabbaso;
tika-abh06t:4002_0: Tattha yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ taṃ, atītānāgatādikaṃ;
tika-abh06t:4003_0: Ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā, sukhumoḷārikampi vā.
tika-abh06t:4005_0: Hīnaṃ vāpi paṇītaṃ vā, yaṃ dūre yañca santike;
tika-abh06t:4011_0: Cittajaṃ pana yaṃ kiñci, taṃ sañjānanalakkhaṇaṃ;
tika-abh06t:4017_0: Tattha cittaṃ tu yaṃ kiñci, taṃ vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ;
tika-abh06t:4032_0: Phālento viya tālassa, kandaṃ tu yamakaṃ dvidhā;
tika-abh06t:4044_0: Evamettha paṇḍito poso, vavatthapeti taṃ pana.
tika-abh06t:4060_0: Na hettha satto manujo ca vijjati;
tika-abh06t:4072_0: Sakeneva hi tejena, na sakkoti pavattituṃ.
tika-abh06t:4074_0: Na byāharati no seti, na tiṭṭhati na gacchati;
tika-abh06t:4075_0: Na bhedeti na coreti, na bhuñjati na khādati.
tika-abh06t:4077_0: Tathā rūpampi nittejaṃ, vinā nāmañca sabbathā;
tika-abh06t:4078_0: Sakeneva hi tejena, na sakkoti pavattituṃ.
tika-abh06t:4083_0: Nāmaṃ nissāya rūpaṃ tu, rūpaṃ nissāya nāmakaṃ;
tika-abh06t:4089_0: Yathā hi nāvaṃ nissāya, manussā yanti aṇṇave;
tika-abh06t:4092_0: Yathā manusse nissāya, nāvā gacchati aṇṇave;
tika-abh06t:4111_0: Kaṅkhā tīsu panaddhāsu, vitaritvā ṭhitaṃ pana.
tika-abh06t:4116_0: Nāmarūpassa ko hetu, konu vā paccayo bhave;
tika-abh06t:4119_0: Kesā lomā nakhā dantā, taco maṃsaṃ nahāru ca;
tika-abh06t:4133_0: Itime pañca dhammā hi, hetupaccayataṃ gatā;
tika-abh06t:4136_0: Janakaṃ pana kammaṃ tu, puttassa hi pitā viya;
tika-abh06t:4137_0: Dhātī viya kumārassa, āhāro dhārako bhave.
tika-abh06t:4145_0: So evaṃ nāmarūpassa, vuttiṃ disvāna paccayā;
tika-abh06t:4151_0: Tassevaṃ passato yā sā, pubbante pañcadhā tathā;
tika-abh06t:4162_0: Tattha ekajavanavīthiyaṃ sattasu cittesu kusalā vā akusalā vā paṭhamajavanacetanā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyakammaṃ nāma.
tika-abh06t:4162_4: natthi kammavipāko”ti imassa tikassa vasena ahosikammaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-abh06t:4162_7: tathā asakkontaṃ vuttanayena ahosikammaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-abh06t:4162_11: sati saṃsārappavattiyā ahosikammaṃ nāma na hoti.
tika-abh06t:4164_0: Aparaṃ catubbidhaṃ kammaṃ, garukaṃ bahulampi ca;
tika-abh06t:4169_0: Tattha janakaṃ nāma kusalaṃ vā akusalaṃ vā kammaṃ paṭisandhiyampi pavattepi rūpārūpavipākakkhandhe janeti.
tika-abh06t:4169_1: Upatthambhakaṃ pana vipākaṃ janetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-abh06t:4169_2: aññena kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā janite vipāke uppajjanakasukhadukkhaṃ upatthambheti,
tika-abh06t:4169_4: Upapīḷakaṃ pana aññena kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā janite vipāke uppajjanakasukhadukkhaṃ pīḷeti bādhati,
tika-abh06t:4169_6: Upaghātakaṃ pana sayaṃ kusalampi akusalampi samānaṃ aññaṃ dubbalakammaṃ ghātetvā tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karoti.
tika-abh06t:4169_7: Evaṃ pana kammena okāse kate taṃvipākamuppannaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-abh06t:4169_8: Iti imaṃ dvādasavidhaṃ kammaṃ kammavaṭṭe pakkhipitvā evameko kammavipākavasena nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṃ karoti.
tika-abh06t:4170_0: Iti evaṃ kammavipākavaṭṭavasena nāmarūpassa pavattiṃ disvā “yathā idaṃ etarahi,
tika-abh06t:4170_2: anāgatepi pavattissatī”ti iti kammañceva vipāko cāti kammavipākavasena loko pavattatīti taṃ samanupassati.
tika-abh06t:4170_3: Tassevaṃ samanupassato sabbā soḷasavidhā kaṅkhā pahiyyati.
tika-abh06t:4175_0: Evaṃ kāraṇato uddhaṃ, kāraṇaṃ na ca passati;
tika-abh06t:4182_0: Evaṃ kamme vipāke ca, vattamāne sahetuke;
tika-abh06t:4192_0: Taṇhāsotena vuyhantā, na te dukkhā pamuccare.
tika-abh06t:4197_0: Kammaṃ natthi vipākamhi, pāko kamme na vijjati;
tika-abh06t:4198_0: Aññamaññaṃ ubho suññā, na ca kammaṃ vinā phalaṃ.
tika-abh06t:4200_0: Yathā na sūriye aggi, na maṇimhi na gomaye;
tika-abh06t:4201_0: Na tesaṃ bahi so atthi, sambhārehi ca jāyati.
tika-abh06t:4203_0: Tathā na anto kammassa, vipāko upalabbhati;
tika-abh06t:4204_0: Bahiddhāpi na kammassa, na kammaṃ tattha vijjati.
tika-abh06t:4206_0: Phalena suññaṃ taṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ kamme na vijjati;
tika-abh06t:4207_0: Kammañca kho upādāya, tato nibbattate phalaṃ.
tika-abh06t:4246_0: Nicayo rāsi vā natthi, tathā uppajjatopi ca.
tika-abh06t:4248_0: Rāsito nicayā vāpi, natthi āgamananti ca;
tika-abh06t:4251_0: Niruddhassāpi ekasmiṃ, ṭhāne natthi cayoti ca;
tika-abh06t:4255_0: Katvā tasseva ñāṇassa, vibhaṅgassa vasena tu.
tika-abh06t:4263_0: Evaṃ rūpudayo hoti, evamassa vayo iti;
tika-abh06t:4264_0: Udeti evaṃ rūpampi, evaṃ rūpaṃ tu veti ca.
tika-abh06t:4267_0: Passato sabbadhammā ca, pākaṭā honti tassa te.
tika-abh06t:4273_0: Asārā pana nissārā, hutvā khāyanti yogino.
tika-abh06t:4276_0: Lakkhaṇāni ca paññāsa, paṭivijjha ṭhitaṃ pana.
tika-abh06t:4278_0: Ñāṇaṃ adhigataṃ hoti, taruṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ pana;
tika-abh06t:4286_0: Obhāso pīti passaddhi, ñāṇaṃ saddhā satī sukhaṃ;
tika-abh06t:4306_0: Pīti vippassanāpīti, tassa tasmiṃ khaṇe pana;
tika-abh06t:4312_0: Lahūni ca mudūneva, kammaññāneva honti hi;
tika-abh06t:4321_0: Amānusī rati hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato.
tika-abh06t:4335_0: Asatte sattasaññī ca, hoti appassuto naro.
tika-abh06t:4341_0: Tassa cevaṃ ayaṃ maggo, nāyaṃ maggoti yogino.
tika-abh06t:4361_0: Udayabbaye ca bhaṅge ca, bhaye ādīnave tathā;
tika-abh06t:4371_0: Etesu pana ñāṇesu, yogo karaṇiyo pana.
tika-abh06t:4377_0: Aṭṭhannaṃ pana ñāṇānaṃ, vasena pana yogino.
tika-abh06t:4383_0: Idāni tassa maggo ca, samuppajjissatīti hi.
tika-abh06t:4385_0: Saṅkhārupekkhā saṅkhāre, aniccā dukkhāti vā tathā;
tika-abh06t:4386_0: Sammasitvā bhavaṅgaṃ tu, puna votarateva sā.
tika-abh06t:4398_0: Dutiyaṃ javanaṃ hoti, upacāranti taṃ mataṃ.
tika-abh06t:4422_0: Ito paraṃ tu bhikkhussa, hoti gotrabhumānasaṃ;
tika-abh06t:4432_0: Gottaṃ vuccati nibbānaṃ, tato bhavati gotrabhu.
tika-abh06t:4435_0: Tattha taṃ paṭhamaṃ maggaṃ, sampādetuṃ panicchatā.
tika-abh06t:4437_0: Aññaṃ kiñcipi kātabbaṃ, bhikkhunā tena natthi taṃ;
tika-abh06t:4438_0: Yañhi tena ca kātabbaṃ, siyā taṃ katameva tu.
tika-abh06t:4441_0: Uppādentena taṃ sabbaṃ, katameva ca yoginā.
tika-abh06t:4459_0: Maggassa pana taṃ saññaṃ, datvā viya nirujjhati.
tika-abh06t:4461_0: Maggopi tena taṃ dinnaṃ, amuñcitvāva sañhitaṃ;
tika-abh06t:4483_0: Tassevānantaraṃ tassa, vipākā dvepi tīṇi vā;
tika-abh06t:4484_0: Phalacittāni jāyante, na jāyante tato paraṃ.
tika-abh06t:4486_0: Keci ekañca dve tīṇi, cattārīti vadanti tu;
tika-abh06t:4487_0: Na panetaṃ gahetabbaṃ, ajānitvā vadanti te.
tika-abh06t:4490_0: Tehi āsevanaṃ laddhā, tatiyaṃ hoti gotrabhu.
tika-abh06t:4497_0: Pañcamaṃ maggacittañca, phalāni dve tato pana;
tika-abh06t:4509_0: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, phalādīnampi pekkhane;
tika-abh06t:4512_0: Maggo phalaṃ pahīnā ca, kilesā avasiṭṭhakā;
tika-abh06t:4532_0: Phalacittāni ñeyyāni, viññunā dvepi tīṇi vā.
tika-abh06t:4608_0: Etesu yena ye dhammā, pahātabbā bhavanti hi;
tika-abh06t:4610_0: Imesu pana catūsu maggañāṇesu ye dhammā yena ñāṇena pahātabbā,
tika-abh06t:4611_3: Sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāso kāmarāgo paṭighoti ime pañca adhobhāgiyasaṃyojanāni nāma.
tika-abh06t:4612_2: lobho doso moho māno diṭṭhi vicikicchā thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti.
tika-abh06t:4613_2: micchādiṭṭhi micchāsaṅkappo micchāvācā micchākammanto micchāājīvo micchāvāyāmo micchāsati micchāsamādhi micchāñāṇaṃ micchāvimuttīti.
tika-abh06t:4614_0: Lokadhammāti aṭṭha lokadhammā lābho alābho yaso ayaso nindā pasaṃsā sukhaṃ dukkhanti.
tika-abh06t:4614_2: alābhādivatthukassa paṭighassa cetaṃ lokadhammagahaṇena gahaṇaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh06t:4615_0: Macchariyānīti pañca macchariyāni āvāsamacchariyaṃ kulamacchariyaṃ lābhamacchariyaṃ dhammamacchariyaṃ vaṇṇamacchariyanti.
tika-abh06t:4615_1: Imāni āvāsādīsu aññesaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ asahanākārena pavattāni macchariyāni.
tika-abh06t:4616_0: Vipallāsāti aniccadukkhaanattaasubhesuyeva vatthūsu “niccaṃ sukhaṃ attā subha”nti evaṃ pavattā saññāvipallāso
tika-abh06t:4620_2: pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṃ kāmesumicchācāro musāvādo pisuṇavācā pharusavācā samphappalāpo abhijjhā byāpādo micchādiṭṭhīti dasa.
tika-abh06t:4621_0: Akusalacittuppādāti lobhamūlāni aṭṭha, dosamūlāni dve, mohamūlāni dveti ime dvādasāti.
tika-abh06t:4622_0: Etesaṃ saṃyojanādīnaṃ etāni yathāsambhavaṃ pahānakarāni. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh06t:4622_1: Saṃyojanesu tāva sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchāsīlabbataparāmāsā apāyagamanīyā kāmarāgapaṭighāti ete paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā,
tika-abh06t:4624_0: Micchattesu micchādiṭṭhi musāvādo micchākammanto micchāājīvoti ime paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā,
tika-abh06t:4625_2: yase pasaṃsāya ca anunayo catutthamaggañāṇavajjhoti eke.
tika-abh06t:4627_3: asubhe subhanti diṭṭhivipallāso cāti ime paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā,
tika-abh06t:4633_0: Upādānesu sabbesampi lokiyadhammānaṃ vatthukāmavasena “kāmā”ti āgatattā rūpārūpesu rāgopi kāmupādāne patati,
tika-abh06t:4636_0: Akusalakammapathesu pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṃ micchācāro musāvādo micchādiṭṭhīti ime paṭhamañāṇavajjhā,
tika-abh06t:4638_2: Tena vuttaṃ “etesaṃ saṃyojanādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ etāni yathāyogaṃ pahānakarānī”ti.
tika-abh06t:4641_0: Yo yo hi dhammo samupeti ghātaṃ;
tika-abh06t:4642_0: So so asesena ca tena tena,
tika-abh06t:4657_0: Padīpo hi yathā loke, apubbācarimaṃ idha;
tika-abh06t:4676_0: Obhāseti ca rūpāni, nāseti timirampi ca;
tika-abh06t:4679_0: Yathā ca mahatī nāvā, apubbācarimaṃ pana;
tika-abh06t:4682_0: Jahatī orimaṃ tīraṃ, sotaṃ chindati sā pana;
tika-abh06t:4688_0: Yathā chindati taṃ sotaṃ, taṇhaṃ jahati taṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t:4689_0: Yathā vahati taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, sahajātādinā pana.
tika-abh06t:4691_0: Tatheva paccayattena, maggaṃ bhāveti nāma so;
tika-abh06t:4692_0: Yathā pāraṃ pana evaṃ, nirodhārammaṇaṃ bhave.
tika-abh06t:4712_0: Dhammā te paccaye cāhaṃ, dassayissāmito paraṃ.
tika-abh06t:4714_0: Tattha hetupaccayoti lobho doso moho alobho adoso amohoti ime cha dhammā hetupaccayā.
tika-abh06t:4714_1: Ārammaṇapaccayoti sabbalokiyalokuttaraṃ yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ ārabbha ye ye dhammā uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā,
tika-abh06t:4714_2: te te dhammā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
tika-abh06t:4715_2: ārammaṇādhipati pana domanassavicikicchuddhaccakiriyābyākatākusalavipāke ca aniṭṭhasammatañca rūpaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ.
tika-abh06t:4718_3: anāsavakusalacetanā anantarameva attano vipākassa paccayo hoti.
tika-abh06t:4720_1: Vippayuttapaccayoti vatthupurejātāni ceva pacchājātā cittacetasikā ca.
tika-abh06t:4721_0: Ettha pana katihākārehi rūpaṃ rūpassa paccayo hotīti?
tika-abh06t:4726_0: Paccayo nāmadhammassa, missakassa na kiñci tu.
tika-abh06t:4732_0: Tipañcahi taṃ rūpassa, ubhinnaṃ terasadhā pana.
tika-abh06t:4733_0: Rūpārūpaṃ rūpassa yathārahaṃ sahajātanissayaatthiavigatavasena catudhā paccayo hoti.
tika-abh06t:4734_0: Rūpārūpaṃ arūpassa yathārahaṃ sahajātaaññamaññanissayindriyaatthiavigatavasena chadhā paccayo hoti.
tika-abh06t:4738_0: Chabbidhā nāmadhammassa, missakassa na kiñci tu.
tika-abh06t:4739_6: sesā pana ekādasa paccayā rūpārūpamissakāti veditabbā.
tika-abh06t:4740_1: sampayuttavippayuttaatthiavigatānaṃ vasena pannarasa paccayā paccuppannāva honti.
tika-abh06t:4740_3: kammapaccayo atīto vā hoti paccuppanno vā,
tika-abh06t:4740_4: ārammaṇādhipatiupanissayapaccayā pana tikālikā honti kālavinimuttā ca.
tika-abh06t:4748_0: Sabbe panime catuvīsati paccayā yathārahaṃ ārammaṇūpanissayakammaatthipaccayānaṃ vasena catūsu paccayesu saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti veditabbā.
tika-abh06t:4754_0: Icchatā nipuṇaṃ buddhiṃ, bhikkhunā pana sotabbo.
tika-abh06t:4766_0: Atthato ganthato cāpi, yuttito cāpi ettha ca;
tika-abh06t:4767_0: Ayuttaṃ vā viruddhaṃ vā, yadi dissati kiñcipi.
tika-abh06t:4800_0: Ayaṃ sumatinā sādhu, yācitena kato satā.
tika-abh06t:4807_0: Uragapuranivasanena ācariyena bhadantabuddhadattena sīlācārasampannena kato abhidhammāvatāro nāmāyaṃ.
tika-abh06t:4821_0: Tattha cittaṃ cetasikaṃ, nibbānanti mataṃ tidhā;
tika-abh06t:4869_0: Dutiyaṃ takkato hīnaṃ, tatiyaṃ tu vicārato;
tika-abh06t:4894_0: Phasso ca vedanā saññā, cetanekaggatā tathā;
tika-abh06t:4907_0: Sattati vīsati ceva, tāni cittāni dīpaye.
tika-abh06t:4912_0: Lobho lobhe tu diṭṭhi ca, diṭṭhiyutte viyuttake;
tika-abh06t:4913_0: Māno ca thinamiddhaṃ tu, sasaṅkhāresu pañcasu.
tika-abh06t:4921_0: Kammaññatā ca pāguññaujutāti yugā cha ca;
tika-abh06t:4926_0: Lokuttare sadā sabbā, saha kāmasubhe visuṃ.
tika-abh06t:4935_0: Nānā kadāci māno ca, thinamiddhaṃ tathā saha.
tika-abh06t:4937_0: Satta sabbattha jāyanti, cha tu dhammā yathārahaṃ;
tika-abh06t:5035_0: Sampayuttātha vā tena, cintentīti ca gocaraṃ.
tika-abh06t:5037_0: Phusatīti bhave phasso, phusanaṃ vātha kevalaṃ;
tika-abh06t:5038_0: Sampayuttātha vā tena, phusantīti ca gocaraṃ.
tika-abh06t:5040_0: Evaṃ kattari bhāve ca, karaṇe ca yathārahaṃ;
tika-abh06t:5223_0: Yogāti cāhu te eva, pāṇino bhavayantake;
tika-abh06t:5229_0: Kāmataṇhā ca diṭṭhi ca, upādānā catubbidhā;
tika-abh06t:5254_0: Diṭṭhi sīlabbataṃ māno, uddhaccena dasā bhave.
tika-abh06t:5294_0: Mūlabhāvena dhammānaṃ, hetū dhammā cha dīpitā.
tika-abh06t:5296_0: Vitakko ca vicāro ca, pīti cekaggatā tathā;
tika-abh06t:5303_0: Sammāsati samādhī ca, micchādiṭṭhi ca sambhavā.
tika-abh06t:5319_0: Saddhā ca sati paññā ca, vīriyekaggatāpi ca;
tika-abh06t:5320_0: Vedanā jīvitaṃ cittaṃ, aṭṭha rūpindriyāni ca.
tika-abh06t:5322_0: Kathaṃ jīvitamekaṃ tu, sukhaṃ dukkhanti vedanā;
tika-abh06t:5341_0: Chando cittañca vīriyaṃ, vīmaṃsāti ca tādinā.
tika-abh06t:5360_0: Sesā tu kusalā ñāṇaviyuttā ca dvihetukā;
tika-abh06t:5366_0: Catujhānaṃ tu dutiyaṃ, kāme ca sukhavajjitā;
tika-abh06t:5367_0: Pañcajhānaṃ tu paṭhamaṃ, kāme ca sukhitā matā.
tika-abh06t:5372_0: Lokiyaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ, tathā kāme tihetukā;
tika-abh06t:5375_0: Sesaṃ mahaggataṃ jhānaṃ, sampayuttā ca diṭṭhiyā;
tika-abh06t:5381_0: Na hontāhetuke maggā, cittaṭṭhiti ca kaṅkhite;
tika-abh06t:5382_0: Viditā niyatatā ca, lokiyesu na uddhaṭā.
tika-abh06t:5425_0: Kāye ca vedanācitte, dhammesu ca yathārahaṃ;
tika-abh06t:5440_0: Pañca saddhā sati paññā, vīriyekaggatā tathā;
tika-abh06t:5492_0: Āvajjanaṃ tu yugaḷaṃ, dassanaṃ savanaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t:5516_0: Ghānādayo tayo rūpe, pañca cakkhādayo tathā;
tika-abh06t:5519_0: Cha dvārā vīthicittāni, satta kāmīsu rūpisu;
tika-abh06t:5523_0: Majjhe bhavaṅgaṃ chetvāna, paccekaṃ vīthi jāyati.
tika-abh06t:5544_0: Vibhūte tu tadālambaṃ, vitthārā sattasaṭṭhi te.
tika-abh06t:5585_0: Kriyābhiññā ca voṭṭhabbaṃ, kriyā kāme tihetukā;
tika-abh06t:5597_0: Catasso dhātuyo rūpe, tīṇi vatthūni nissitā;
tika-abh06t:5621_0: Iccevaṃ chasu devesu, manussesu ca jāyare;
tika-abh06t:5636_0: Avihā ca atappā ca, sudassā ca sudassino;
tika-abh06t:5694_0: Maggaṭṭhesu sako maggo, puggalesu ayaṃ nayo.
tika-abh06t:5706_0: Bhavaṅgaṃ taṃ pana chetvā, hoti āvajjanaṃ tato.
tika-abh06t:5718_0: Na hoti domanassamhā, somanassaṃ tu sabbadā.
tika-abh06t:5727_0: Pañcamaṃ vā catutthaṃ vā, javanaṃ hoti appanā.
tika-abh06t:5745_0: Bhavaṅgādi ca voṭṭhabbaṃ, javanādi sakiṃ pana.
tika-abh06t:5751_0: Pañca vāre cha vā satta, samuppajjati sambhavā.
tika-abh06t:5754_0: Vīthicittāvasāne tu, bhavaṅgaṃ cuti vā bhave.
tika-abh06t:5787_0: Phalamhā cuddasevāhu, maggamhā tu sakaṃ phalaṃ;
tika-abh06t:5809_0: Tikā mahaggatā javā, maggā kāmajavā dvayā.
tika-abh06t:5824_0: Sabbesaṃ paṭisandhī ca, cuti cārahato tathā.
tika-abh06t:5873_0: Paccuppanne ca taṃ dukkhaṃ, āyatiṃ dukkhapākajaṃ.
tika-abh06t:5909_0: Pākadāyakakammaṃ tu, yaṃ kiñci janakaṃ bhave.
tika-abh06t:5987_0: Chandādosā bhayā mohā, pāpaṃ kubbanti pāṇino;

tika-abh06t:6295_0: Aladdhā tādisaṃ hetuṃ, abhiññā na vipaccati.

tika-abh06t:6314_0: Buddho bodhitale yamāha sugato gantvāna devālayaṃ,
tika-abh06t:6333_0: Bhūtarūpaṃ tu pathavī, āpo tejo tathāparo;
tika-abh06t:6339_0: Cakkhu sotañca ghānañca, jivhā kāyoti pañcadhā;
tika-abh06t:6416_0: Rūpaṃ nibhāso bhūtānaṃ, saddo nigghosanaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t:6417_0: Gandhova gandhanaṃ tattha, raso ca rasanīyatā.

tika-abh06t:6497_0: Kappenti kāyamattānaṃ, bālā yāya ca vañcitā.
tika-abh06t:6515_0: Lahū mudu ca kammaññaṃ, yadā rūpaṃ pavattati.

tika-abh06t:6601_0: Diṭṭhaṃ rūpaṃ sutaṃ saddo, mutaṃ gandhādikattayaṃ;
tika-abh06t:6605_0: Pasādā vatthu ca dvāraṃ, aññaṃ tubhayavajjitaṃ.
tika-abh06t:6625_0: Sabbe kāmabhave rūpe, āhāro na samīrito.
tika-abh06t:6628_0: Jīvamānassa sabbepi, matassotu siyā na vā.
tika-abh06t:6649_0: Nava cha caturo dveti, ekavīsati bhāvayuṃ.

tika-abh06t:6672_0: Suddhaṭṭhakaṃ tu paṭhamaṃ, saddena navakaṃ mataṃ;
tika-abh06t:6722_0: Tattha gandharasojā ca, na labbhantīti kecana;

tika-abh06t:6736_0: Rūpavibhāgamimaṃ suvibhattaṃ, rūpayato pana cetasi niccaṃ;

tika-abh06t:6762_0: Ārammaṇā eva nāma, nālambanti hi kiñcipi.
tika-abh06t:6789_0: Tadaññe araṇā nāma, pahātabbā na kehici.
tika-abh06t:6794_0: Bālā dhammā tapanīyā, kaṇhā ca kaṭukapphalā;

tika-abh06t:6815_0: Kriyā rūpañca nibbānaṃ, na pākaṃ na tu paccati;

tika-abh06t:6833_0: Hīnaṃ paṇītaṃ yaṃ dūre, santike vā tadekato;

tika-abh06t:6843_0: Sandhāya vedanā saññā, katā nānāti kecana.
tika-abh06t:6857_0: Bhājanaṃ bhojanaṃ tassa, byañjanaṃ bhojako tathā;
tika-abh06t:6863_0: Cārako kāraṇaṃ tattha, aparādho ca kārako;
tika-abh06t:6903_0: Sesaṃ rūpañca nibbānaṃ, sabbe cetasikāti ca.
tika-abh06t:6926_0: Dukkhaṃ samudayo ceva, nirodho ca tathāparo;
tika-abh06t:6944_0: Tathā hi dukkhaṃ nābādhaṃ, nāññaṃ dukkhā ca bādhakaṃ;
tika-abh06t:6947_0: Taṃ vinā nāññato dukkhaṃ, na hoti na ca taṃ tato;
tika-abh06t:6950_0: Nāññā nibbānato santi, na ca santaṃ na taṃ yato;
tika-abh06t:6953_0: Nāññaṃ maggāca niyyānaṃ, aniyyāno na cāpi so;
tika-abh06t:6979_0: Jāti jarā ca maraṇaṃ, soko ca paridevanā;
tika-abh06t:6982_0: Appiyehi ca saṃyogo, vippayogo piyehi ca;
tika-abh06t:6983_0: Yampi na labhaticchanto, tampi dukkhamidaṃ mataṃ.
tika-abh06t:7007_0: Dukkhā ca dukkhavatthu ca, bahudhāpi papañcitā.
tika-abh06t:7069_0: Asmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti, assuppādā idaṃ bhave;
tika-abh06t:7070_0: Asatāsmiṃ na taṃ hoti, tassa bhaṅgāva bhijjati.
tika-abh06t:7090_0: Phasso ca vedanā taṇhā, upādānaṃ bhavoti ca;
tika-abh06t:7091_0: Paccuppanno bhave addhā, bhave addhā anāgato.
tika-abh06t:7093_0: Jāti jarā maraṇanti, dvedhā hoti ca sabbathā;
tika-abh06t:7117_0: Sukhā dukkhā upekkhāti, vedanā tividhā bhave;
tika-abh06t:7118_0: Kāme bhave ca vibhave, taṇhāti tividhā matā.
tika-abh06t:7168_0: Vipākā puna kammāni, pākāni puna kammato;
tika-abh06t:7199_0: Ajātānaṃ jarā vātha, maraṇaṃ vā kuto bhave.
tika-abh06t:7300_0: Chadhā nāmaṃ tu nāmassa, pañcadhā nāmarūpinaṃ;
tika-abh06t:7301_0: Ekadhā puna rūpassa, rūpaṃ nāmassa cekadhā.
tika-abh06t:7304_0: Dvayassa navadhā ceti, chabbidhā paccayā kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t:7319_0: Dhammā te eva vuccanti, vigatappaccayoti ca.
tika-abh06t:7385_0: Paññatti ceva nāmānaṃ, paccayo duvidho mato.
tika-abh06t:7471_0: Iti taṃ tamupādāya, samaññātā tathā tathā;
tika-abh06t:7478_0: Upādāya ca paññatti, sā evopanidhāya ca.
tika-abh06t:7502_0: Khattiyo narasīho ca, bhātā lohitakaṃ yuvā.
tika-abh06t:7528_0: Satthā yaṃ paramatthamuttamaguṇo nāmañca rūpanti ca,
tika-abh06t:7531_0: Āraddhaṃ kamato mayevamakhilaṃ taṃ suṭṭhu niṭṭhāpitaṃ.
tika-abh06t:7533_0: Yaṃ dhammaṃ dhammarājā niratikamabhisambodhi maggena buddhā,
tika-abh06t:7547_0: Bhāvanā duvidhā tattha, samatho ca vipassanā;
tika-abh06t:7548_0: Samatho duvidho tattha, paritto ca mahaggato.
tika-abh06t:7554_0: Appamaññā ca saññā ca, vavatthāruppakāni ca.
tika-abh06t:7634_0: Sesāni pana sabbesaṃ, tatthāpi kasiṇaṃ budhā.
tika-abh06t:7660_0: Āvāsaṃ gocaraṃ bhassaṃ, puggalaṃ bhojanaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t:7663_0: Sevanto satta sappāye, te evāti padhānavā;
tika-abh06t:7679_0: Na tu kassaci accantā, alaṅkārāva yācitā.
tika-abh06t:7789_0: Viddhaṃsetvā vinassanti, idha ceva parattha ca.
tika-abh06t:7792_0: Yattha bālā visīdanti, natthi saṅgo vijānataṃ.
tika-abh06t:7926_0: Uddhatā ca pamattā ca, dabbitā ketugāhino.
tika-abh06t:7983_0: Papātamiva gambhīraṃ, miḷhaṃ viya ca paṇḍito.
tika-abh06t:8129_0: Asubhaṃ pana bhāvento, nimittaṃ yattha katthaci;
tika-abh06t:8167_0: Yathā idaṃ tathā etaṃ, yathā etaṃ tathā idaṃ;
tika-abh06t:8176_0: Anattā ca parābhūtā, vibbhijjati khaṇe khaṇe.
tika-abh06t:8351_0: Cattāro ca paṭipannā, cattāro ca phale ṭhitā;
tika-abh06t:8404_0: Ādi cetaṃ patiṭṭhā ca, mukhaṃ pamukhamuttamaṃ;
tika-abh06t:8481_0: Subandhaṃ mama sabbattha, gahito ca kaṭaggaho”.
tika-abh06t:8486_0: Saddhaṃ sīlaṃ sutaṃ cāgaṃ, paññaṃ paṇḍitajātiko;
tika-abh06t:8504_0: Te sabbepi ca mayhampi, vijjanti anupāyino;
tika-abh06t:8508_0: Dullabhāpi ca me laddhā, saddhā sugatasāsane.
tika-abh06t:8522_0: Paññā vatthusabhāve ca, tikhiṇā mama vattati.
tika-abh06t:8536_0: Virāgo ca nirodho ca, cāgo mutti anālayo;
tika-abh06t:8585_0: Jātā puna marissanti, evaṃdhammā hi pāṇino.
tika-abh06t:8588_0: Abbhuṭṭhitova so yāti, sa gacchaṃ na nivattati.
tika-abh06t:8590_0: Sattā maranti gabbhepi, jāyamānā ca dārakā;
tika-abh06t:8615_0: Assāsepi avissaṭṭhe, jīvikā ce kathāva kā.
tika-abh06t:8632_0: Niccaṃ maccuvasaṃ yanto, vissaṭṭho kimahaṃ care.
tika-abh06t:8657_0: Kesā lomā nakhā dantā, taco maṃsaṃ nahāru ca;

tika-abh06t:8708_0: Hitvā appaguṇe tattha, gaṇhaṃ suppaguṇaṃ budho;
tika-abh06t:8735_0: Sukhumā nipuṇā tikkhā, paripakkā bale ṭhitā;
tika-abh06t:8753_0: Pañcannaṃ na ṭhapetabbaṃ, heṭṭhā na dasatopari;
