tika-abh06t:8768_0: Nimitte ṭhapayaṃ cittaṃ, tato pāpeti appanaṃ;
tika-abh06t:8798_0: Thūle te eva saṅkhāre, sametuṃ paribhāvayaṃ;
tika-abh06t:8851_0: Buddhaṃ dhammañca saṅghaṃ puthunanamahitaṃ suddhasīlaṃ sudānaṃ,
tika-abh06t:8861_0: Appamaññā tu bhāvento, vineyya paṭighaṃ kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t:8986_0: Sabbe sattā ca pāṇā ca, bhūtā jīvā ca puggalā;
tika-abh06t:8993_0: Modantu suhitā sabbe, mā kiñci pāpamāgamā.
tika-abh06t:9007_0: Mettāya mitte majjhatte, verike ca yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh06t:9008_0: Karonto sīmasambhedaṃ, attani ca samaṃ phare.
tika-abh06t:9020_0: Bahukesu ca sattesu, sabbesu ca pavattati.
tika-abh06t:9042_0: Te tattha kaṭukaṃ ghoramanubhontā sakaṃ phalaṃ;
tika-abh06t:9057_0: Iti disvāna sutvā vā, sambhāvetvāna vā puna;
tika-abh06t:9104_0: Iti disvāna sutvā vā, sambhāvetvā punappunaṃ;
tika-abh06t:9139_0: Kassa vā ruciyā honti, sukhitā vātha dukkhitā.
tika-abh06t:9142_0: Na sakkā parivattetuṃ, aññena puna kenaci.
tika-abh06t:9153_0: Ahaṃ ko nāma ke cete, kimaṭṭhānabudhantaro;
tika-abh06t:9156_0: Sukhitā hontu vā mā vā, dukkhā muccantu vā na vā;
tika-abh06t:9157_0: Samiddhā vā daliddā vā, kā mamettha vicāraṇā.
tika-abh06t:9160_0: Palibodho papañco vā, byāpādo vā na me tahiṃ.
tika-abh06t:9203_0: Mātāva dahare putte, gilāne yobbane ṭhite;
tika-abh06t:9210_0: Sukhaṃ supati suttopi, pāpaṃ kiñci na passati.
tika-abh06t:9218_0: Phullaṃva kamalaṃ kāle, candaṃva vimalaṃ jano;
tika-abh06t:9236_0: Avañjhā tassa pabbajjā, yassa hetāsu gāravo;
tika-abh06t:9252_0: Appamaññā tato tāsu, na pamajjeyya paṇḍito.
tika-abh06t:9326_0: Saṅkhepena ca vitthārā, sambhārā ca salakkhaṇā;
tika-abh06t:9327_0: Ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, catudhā vibhaje kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t:9365_0: Āyu usmā ca viññāṇaṃ, yadā kāyaṃ jahantimaṃ;
tika-abh06t:9394_0: Nibbindanto tato rūpe, tadākāre ca gocare;
tika-abh06t:9400_0: Na taṃ manasi karoti, nāvajjati na pekkhati;
tika-abh06t:9431_0: Eko bahi anissāya, taṃ taṃ nissāya cāparo.
tika-abh06t:9437_0: Aṅgabhedaṃ panetāsaṃ, na kathenti tathāpi ca.
tika-abh06t:9472_0: Tathā mānusakaṃ rūpaṃ, thūlaṃ sukhuma santikaṃ.
tika-abh06t:9474_0: Dūre pakāsaṃ channañca, yena passanti yogino;
tika-abh06t:9492_0: Punadeva ca vuṭṭhāya, parikammaṃ yathā pure;
tika-abh06t:9538_0: Tividhā ca samāpatti, nirodhā ca tathāparā;
tika-abh06t:9578_0: Tattha tattha vibhūtattā, ṭhānato bheditā kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t:9623_0: Aniccā ca pabhaṅgū ca, palujjanti cavanti ca.
tika-abh06t:9625_0: Addhuvā ca asārā ca, vibhavā ca vināsino;
tika-abh06t:9634_0: Jāyanti parihānāya, na tu jāyanti vuddhiyā;
tika-abh06t:9638_0: Hutvā antaradhāyanti, na tu katthaci sañcitā.
tika-abh06t:9641_0: Nirodhadhammā jāyanti, jātā byanti bhavanti te.
tika-abh06t:9643_0: Yathā nadī pabbateyyā, yathā dīpasikhā tathā;
tika-abh06t:9646_0: Jātā jātā nirujjhanti, aññe aññe tu jāyare;
tika-abh06t:9653_0: Rogā gaṇḍā ca sallā ca, aghato ca upaddavā.
tika-abh06t:9665_0: Jegucchā paṭikūlā ca, bībhacchā ca virūpino;
tika-abh06t:9669_0: Kapaṇā duggatā dīnā, vipannā ca vighātino.
tika-abh06t:9677_0: Jāyamānā ca jiyyantā, miyyantā ca khaṇe khaṇe;
tika-abh06t:9716_0: Na kiñcettha apekkhitvā, samaggā honti paccayā;
tika-abh06t:9717_0: Na janetuṃ na sakkonti, samaggā ca kudācanaṃ.
tika-abh06t:9720_0: Rakkhitā vā vidhātā vā, natthi assāmikā tathā.
tika-abh06t:9725_0: Rittā tucchā ca suññā ca, vivittā sāravajjitā;
tika-abh06t:9728_0: Jāyamānā ca jiyyantā, miyyamānā ca saṅkhatā;
tika-abh06t:9729_0: Vivasā parivattanti, vaso tesaṃ na katthaci.
tika-abh06t:9731_0: Na tesu kassacisseraṃ, na tesañcatthi katthaci;
tika-abh06t:9761_0: Jāyamānā ca jiyyantā, miyyamānā ca saṅkhatā;
tika-abh06t:9762_0: Taṃ taṃ bhāvamatikkamma, pavattanti khaṇe khaṇe.
tika-abh06t:9773_0: Nimitte ca pavatte ca, vatthuto yanti saṅgahaṃ;
tika-abh06t:9785_0: Niccā dhuvā ce saṅkhārā, kasmā pekkhanti paccaye;
tika-abh06t:9786_0: Ahutvā yadi nissāya, jātā kā tattha niccatā;
tika-abh06t:9816_0: Saṅkhāre dukkhato disvā, hitvāna paṇidhiṃ tahiṃ.
tika-abh06t:9822_0: Nimitte ca pavatte ca, upaṭṭhāti anattato.
tika-abh06t:9845_0: Tathā hi paccayārabbha, saṅkhārā nissayanti ce;
tika-abh06t:9854_0: Aniccā puna saṅkhārā, dukkhāti ca vavatthitā;
tika-abh06t:9887_0: Iccāniccānimittā ca, nirodhā ca khayā vayā;
tika-abh06t:9950_0: Bhaṅge ñāṇaṃ bhaye ñāṇaṃ, ñāṇamādīnavepi ca.
tika-abh06t:9990_0: Niccā ce na nirujjheyyuṃ, na bādheyyuṃ sukhā yadi;
tika-abh06t:9991_0: Vase vatteyyumattā ce, tadabhāvā na tādisā.
tika-abh06t:9999_0: Kālena sammase rūpaṃ, nāmaṃ kālena sammase;
tika-abh06t:10006_0: Sūpaṭṭhanti ca saṅkhārā, vodāyati ca bhāvanā.
tika-abh06t:10067_0: Obhāso pīti passaddhi, adhimokkho ca paggaho;
tika-abh06t:10083_0: Maggo visuddhiyā nāma, visuddhā ca vipassanā.
tika-abh06t:10107_0: Udayamhā vimuccitvā, bhaṅge ṭhāti yathā kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t:10124_0: Ātape viya ussāvo, parissāve jalaṃ viya;
tika-abh06t:10133_0: Jāyantāpi ca jiyyantā, miyyantā ca nirantaraṃ;
tika-abh06t:10196_0: Leṇaṃ tāṇaṃ patiṭṭhā vā, saraṇaṃ vā na vijjati.
tika-abh06t:10240_0: Mīnāva kumīne baddhā, pañjare viya pakkhino;
tika-abh06t:10243_0: Paṅke sanno mahānāgo, cando rāhumukhaṃ gato;
tika-abh06t:10264_0: Aggiṃ viya ca samphuṭṭha-masuciṃ gahitaṃ viya;
tika-abh06t:10283_0: Gandhaṃ viya ca pisento, pisitaṃyeva sādhukaṃ.
tika-abh06t:10294_0: Aniccā vata saṅkhārā, niccāti gahitā pure;
tika-abh06t:10297_0: Aniccā dukkhānattā ca, saṅkhatā puna sabbathā;
tika-abh06t:10303_0: Ahaṃ mamanti vohāro, paro vātha parassa vā;
tika-abh06t:10304_0: Attā vā attanīyaṃ vā, vatthuto natthi katthaci.
tika-abh06t:10306_0: Yathāpi aṅgasambhārā, hoti saddo ratho iti;
tika-abh06t:10307_0: Evaṃ khandhesu santesu, hoti sattoti sammuti.
tika-abh06t:10309_0: Tattha kappenti attānaṃ, bālā dummedhino janā;
tika-abh06t:10310_0: Ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā, passato natthi kiñcanaṃ.
tika-abh06t:10312_0: Sukhito dukkhito vātha, puggalo nāma katthaci;
tika-abh06t:10315_0: Jāyamānā ca jiyyantā, miyyamānā ca saṅkhatā;
tika-abh06t:10316_0: Attāva dukkhitā hete, na tu dukkhāya kassaci.
tika-abh06t:10318_0: Dukkhameva hi sambhoti, dukkhaṃ tiṭṭhati veti ca;
tika-abh06t:10319_0: Nāññatra dukkhā sambhoti, nāññaṃ dukkhā nirujjhati.
tika-abh06t:10324_0: Aniccā hontu saṅkhārā, dukkhitā vā mamettha kiṃ;
tika-abh06t:10327_0: Iti disvā yathābhūtaṃ, yāva bhaṅgā tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t:10342_0: Na pasārīyatī cittaṃ, na tu sajjati bajjhati;
tika-abh06t:10351_0: Añjasaṃ maggamuḷhova, dīpaṃ viya ca aṇṇave.
tika-abh06t:10360_0: Pakkhīva nipphalaṃ rukkhaṃ, hitvā vuṭṭhāti saṅkhatā.
tika-abh06t:10390_0: Vuṭṭhānaṃ ubhato tasmā, khandhato ca kilesato.
tika-abh06t:10392_0: Dve tathā tīṇi vā honti, phalāni ca tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t:10396_0: Hīne kilese sese ca, paccavekkhati vā na vā.
tika-abh06t:10399_0: Tato paraṃ pariggayha, nāmarūpaṃ yathā pure.
tika-abh06t:10421_0: Pariññā ca pahānañca, sacchikiriyā ca bhāvanā;
tika-abh06t:10424_0: Taṃ sabbaṃ maggakālamhi, karissati tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t:10431_0: Paraṃ klesā na jāyanti, daḍḍhabījaṅkuraṃ yathā.
tika-abh06t:10434_0: Maggova maggaṃ bhāveti, jāyamānotha vā puna.
tika-abh06t:10448_0: Maggo eva hi niyyāti, sesā tassopakārakā;
tika-abh06t:10454_0: Katvānābhinivesaṃ tu, yattha tattha yathā tathā;
tika-abh06t:10457_0: Yato kutoci vuṭṭhānaṃ, yadi hoti aniccato;
tika-abh06t:10464_0: Saṅkhāre dukkhato disvā, vuṭṭhahanto sa puggalo.
tika-abh06t:10478_0: Arūpato ca maggena, āneñjena ca rūpato;
tika-abh06t:10487_0: Tasmā saddhā ca paññā ca, vatthunicchayalakkhaṇā;
tika-abh06t:10510_0: Sakiṃdeva imaṃ lokaṃ, āgantvā puna puggalo;
tika-abh06t:10516_0: Anāgāmī ca tatiyo, catuttho arahāti ca;
tika-abh06t:10517_0: Itthaṃ phalaṭṭhā cattāro, maggaṭṭhā ca tatopare.
tika-abh06t:10520_0: Cattāro ca yugā honti, aṭṭha cāriyapuggalā.
tika-abh06t:10532_0: Paṭibhāne ca bhāsanti, ñāṇaṃ bhedagataṃ budhā.
tika-abh06t:10541_0: Yo vohāro sabhāvena, sā niruttīti sammatā.
tika-abh06t:10605_0: Visuṃ visuṃ vibhattāti, vibhāgettha tidhā matā.
tika-abh06t:10656_0: Tesaṃ dāni pavakkhāmi, vibhāgaṃ tu yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh06t:10746_0: Dutiyaṃ takkato hīnaṃ, tatiyaṃ tu vicārato;
tika-abh06t:10764_0: Cattāri pañcakāneva, maggesu ca phalesu ca;
tika-abh06t:10780_0: Kāmesu catupaññāsa, rūpesu dasa pañca ca;
tika-abh06t:10793_0: Pāpaṃ natthi kriyāpāpā, na vijjanti anuttare.
tika-abh06t:10799_0: Chattiṃsa tesaṃ pākāni, kriyā vīsa na cobhayaṃ.
tika-abh06t:10814_0: Bhavaṅgaṃ cuti sandhīti, cittaṃ cuddasadhā ṭhitaṃ.
tika-abh06t:10816_0: Āvajjanādayo dve dve, yugā satta yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh06t:10831_0: Aṭṭhasaṭṭhi tathā dve ca, navaṭṭha dve yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh06t:10856_0: Āruppe pana sabbampi, rūpāyattaṃ na vijjati.
tika-abh06t:10858_0: Asaññīnaṃ tu sabbāni, cittāneva na labbhare;
tika-abh06t:10870_0: Datvā tihetukaṃ sandhiṃ, kāme sugatiyaṃ pana;
tika-abh06t:10874_0: Datvā dvihetukaṃ sandhiṃ, kāme sugatiyaṃ tathā.
tika-abh06t:10926_0: Majjhe bhavaṅgaṃ chinditvā, vīthi nāma pavattati.
tika-abh06t:10950_0: Na sambhoti tadālambaṃ, sopi moghoti vuccati.
tika-abh06t:10983_0: Pañcamaṃ vā catutthaṃ vā, javanaṃ hoti appanā.
tika-abh06t:10991_0: Pañca vāre cha vā satta, parittajavanaṃ bhave;
tika-abh06t:10997_0: Sakiṃ dve vā nirodhassa, samāpattikkhaṇe pana;
tika-abh06t:11020_0: Sattāpi vīthicittāni, kāme rūpe cha sambhavā;
tika-abh06t:11078_0: Phalamhā cuddasevāhu, maggamhā tu sakaṃ phalaṃ;
tika-abh06t:11085_0: Tettiṃsa pana nissāya, hadayaṃ mānasā siyuṃ.
tika-abh06t:11094_0: Nissāya hadayaṃ honti, arūpe nissayaṃ vinā.
tika-abh06t:11109_0: Chasu dvāresu jāyanti, dasa muttā ca vīthiyā.
tika-abh06t:11117_0: Chattiṃsa tayekatiṃsa, dasa ceva naveti ca;
tika-abh06t:11165_0: Cha sabbatthāpi hontīti, sattadhā mānasā ṭhitā.
tika-abh06t:11173_0: Ajjhattā ca bahiddhā ca, pañcadvāresu gocarā;
tika-abh06t:11189_0: Ante cuti bhave majjhe, bhavaṅgampi pavattatīti.
tika-abh06t:11196_0: Cittānaṃ pana sabbesaṃ, kamato saṅgahaṃ kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t:11204_0: Chaḷete devalokā ca, mānavāti ca sattadhā;
tika-abh06t:11216_0: Vehapphalā asaññī ca, suddhāvāsā ca pañcadhā;
tika-abh06t:11219_0: Avihā ca atappā ca, sudassā ca sudassino;
tika-abh06t:11240_0: Tatiyamhi catutthaṃ tu, catutthamhi ca pañcamaṃ;
tika-abh06t:11241_0: Āruppā ca kameneva, āruppe honti sandhiyo.
tika-abh06t:11250_0: Bhāvetvā tividhā honti, tīsu bhūmīsu yogino.
tika-abh06t:11280_0: Na ciraṭṭhāyino tattha, lokiyāpi ca yogino.
tika-abh06t:11283_0: Pabbajjāyañca bhumme ca, brahmattepi ca tiṭṭhare.
tika-abh06t:11318_0: Kappeko dve ca cattāro, aṭṭha kappā ca soḷasa.
tika-abh06t:11323_0: Kappasahassaṃ dve cattāri, aṭṭha soḷasa cakkamā;
tika-abh06t:11344_0: Vinipātāsure ceva, mānave ca tayopi ca.
tika-abh06t:11353_0: Ñatvā viññū vibhāveyya, tattha cittāni sambhavāti.
tika-abh06t:11393_0: Catudhā tividhā ceva, ekadhāti ca bhedato.
tika-abh06t:11402_0: Cattārekādasa dve dve, satta tevīsa cuddasa.
tika-abh06t:11422_0: Ekūnasattati rūpe, suddhe paññāsa pañca ca;
tika-abh06t:11447_0: Maggaṭṭhānaṃ sako maggo, natthaññaṃ kiñci sabbathā.
tika-abh06t:11461_0: Sattavīsa ca tevīsa, tevīsa ca yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh06t:11465_0: Ariyā ceva aṭṭhāti, dvādasannaṃ vasā siyuṃ.
tika-abh06t:11470_0: Chabbīsa cuddasevātha, terasa dve ca mānasā;
tika-abh06t:11471_0: Dasa sattādhikā ceva, puna sattādhikā dasāti.
tika-abh06t:11492_0: Tasmā tesaṃ na vattanti, tāni cittāni sabbathā;
tika-abh06t:11493_0: Maggaṭṭhānaṃ tu maggova, nāññaṃ sambhoti kiñcipi.
tika-abh06t:11502_0: Natthi sahetukā pākā, duggatattā hi sandhiyā.
tika-abh06t:11511_0: Sattapāpapahīnā ca, tasmā natthettha tāni ca.
tika-abh06t:11534_0: Ñeyyā cetasi sambhūtā, dhammā cetasikā kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t:11536_0: Phasso ca vedanā saññā, cetanekaggatā tathā;
tika-abh06t:11539_0: Vitakko ca vicāro ca, pīti ca vīriyaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t:11540_0: Chando ca adhimokkho ca, cha pakiṇṇakanāmakā.
tika-abh06t:11546_0: Alobho ca adoso ca, paññā majjhattatāpi ca.
tika-abh06t:11552_0: Kammaññatā ca pāguñña-tā ca ujukatāti ca.
tika-abh06t:11572_0: Cittena saddhi aṭṭhannaṃ, vippayogo na katthaci.
tika-abh06t:11610_0: Lobho ca lobhamūlesu, diṭṭhiyuttesu diṭṭhi ca;
tika-abh06t:11613_0: Dosamūlesu doso ca, issā macchariyaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t:11619_0: Māno ca thinamiddhañca, saha vātha visuṃ na vā;
tika-abh06t:11626_0: Satta sādhāraṇā ceva, cha dhammā ca pakiṇṇakā;
tika-abh06t:11644_0: Vitakkaṃ dutiye hitvā, vicārañca tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t:11656_0: Vitakkaṃ dutiye hitvā, vicārañca tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t:11657_0: Pītiṃ hitvā catutthe ca, pañcamepi ca sabbathā.
tika-abh06t:11665_0: Viratī appamaññā ca, gahetvā pana sabbaso;
tika-abh06t:11666_0: Ekamekaṃ gahetvā ca, paccakkhāya ca sabbathā.
tika-abh06t:11668_0: Kāmesu sattadhā puññe, catudhā ca kriye tathā;
tika-abh06t:11675_0: Ñatvā yojeyya medhāvī, sāvajjesu ca saṅgahaṃ.
tika-abh06t:11677_0: Satta sādhāraṇā ceva, cha dhammā ca pakiṇṇakā;
tika-abh06t:11686_0: Paṭighe ca vinā pītiṃ, asaṅkhāre tatheva te;
tika-abh06t:11692_0: Chandaṃ pītiñca uddhacce, hitvā pañcadaseva te;
tika-abh06t:11693_0: Hitvā vimokkhaṃ kaṅkhañca, gahetvā kaṅkhite tathā.
tika-abh06t:11698_0: Hitvā chāniyate dhamme, gahetvā ca yathārahaṃ;
tika-abh06t:11707_0: Voṭṭhabbe ca vinā pītiṃ, vīriyaṃ sukhatīraṇe;
tika-abh06t:11716_0: Iti cetasike dhamme, cittesu gaṇite puna;
tika-abh06t:11717_0: Cittena saha saṅgayha, gaṇeyyāpi ca paṇḍito.
tika-abh06t:11719_0: Aṭṭhatiṃsāti ye vuttā, cittena saha te puna;
tika-abh06t:11722_0: Bāvīsevaṃ dasa dve ca, pañca ceti yathārahaṃ;
tika-abh06t:11725_0: Vitakko ca vicāro ca, pīti paññā tathā pana;
tika-abh06t:11735_0: Na calanti dasa aññe, cuddasā cha ca sambhavāti.
tika-abh06t:11747_0: Ekadhā chabbidhā ceva, catudhā sattadhā ṭhitā;
tika-abh06t:11751_0: Sattasataṃ dasa dve ca, sabbe honti samissitā.
tika-abh06t:11778_0: Tisataṃ navuti dve ca, bhinnā honti pakiṇṇakā.
tika-abh06t:11799_0: Catudhā diṭṭhimāno ca, catudhā diṭṭhiyo visuṃ.
tika-abh06t:11826_0: Kusalañca kriyā ceti, bheditaṃ duvidhampi ca.
tika-abh06t:11828_0: Taṃ dvayampi sammissetvā, pañcābhiññā ca lokiyā;
tika-abh06t:11848_0: Yuganandhā ca samathā, tathā yevāpanāti ca.
tika-abh06t:11850_0: Phasso ca vedanā saññā, cetanā cittameva ca;
tika-abh06t:11853_0: Vitakko ca vicāro ca, pīti cekaggatā tathā;
tika-abh06t:11856_0: Saddhindriyañca vīriyaṃ, sati ceva samādhi ca;
tika-abh06t:11857_0: Paññā catubbidhā vuttā, mano pañcāpi vedanā.
tika-abh06t:11874_0: Tattha jīvitarūpañca, aṭṭhettha na tu gayhare;
tika-abh06t:11878_0: Sammāsati samādhi ca, micchādiṭṭhi ca dhammato.
tika-abh06t:11881_0: Sammāmicchāti saṅkappo, vāyāmo ca samādhi ca.
tika-abh06t:11909_0: Chando ca adhimokkho ca, tatramajjhattatā tathā;
tika-abh06t:11912_0: Māno ca thinamiddhañca, issā macchariyaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t:11916_0: Tato ca sesā sabbepi, niyatāti pakittitā.
tika-abh06t:11918_0: Keci rāsiṃ na bhajanti, keci cāniyatā yato;
tika-abh06t:11937_0: Vedanā tīsu vīriyaṃ, sati ca caturāsikā;
tika-abh06t:11938_0: Samādhi chasu paññā ca, sattaṭṭhānesu dīpitā.
tika-abh06t:11951_0: Saññā ca cetanā ceva, bhinnā chadhā ca sattadhā.
tika-abh06t:11960_0: Indriyāni ca bāvīsa, dhammato pana soḷasa.
tika-abh06t:11962_0: Nava maggaṅgadhammā ca, bhinnā dvādasadhāpi te;
tika-abh06t:11965_0: Dasa kammapathā dhammā, chaḷeva pana desitā;
tika-abh06t:11968_0: Paññā dasavidhā tattha, vedanā navadhā ṭhitā;
tika-abh06t:11969_0: Samādhi sattadhā hoti, vīriyaṃ pana pañcadhā.
tika-abh06t:11971_0: Sati bhinnā catudhāva, vitakko tividho mato;
tika-abh06t:11974_0: Sesā dvattiṃsa sabbepi, dhammā ekekadhāpi ca;
tika-abh06t:11977_0: Phasso ca cetanā saññā, vicāro pīti jīvitaṃ;
tika-abh06t:11983_0: Cittaṃ manindriyaṃ cittaṃ, saddhā saddhindriyaṃ balaṃ;
tika-abh06t:11984_0: Balesu lokiyā vuttā, lokiye ca dukadvaye.
tika-abh06t:11998_0: Catudhā sati tattheva, vīriyampi ca pañcadhā.
tika-abh06t:12000_0: Samādhi sattadhā vutto, jhānaṅgesu ca tattha ca;
tika-abh06t:12007_0: Tepaññāseva dhammā ca, aṭṭhārasa ca rāsayo.
tika-abh06t:12047_0: Dhammā pana samatiṃsa, tattha honti sarūpato.
tika-abh06t:12052_0: Tattha dvādasa dhammā ca, desitā savibhattikā;
tika-abh06t:12056_0: Sattavīsa ca satteko, dvekeko ca yathākkamaṃ.
tika-abh06t:12061_0: Tattha cāniyate sabbe, gahetvā ca pahāya ca;
tika-abh06t:12077_0: Appamaññā ca hitvātha, mahāpāke ca yojaye.
tika-abh06t:12080_0: Pañcame appamaññāya, hitvā rūpe ca yojaye.
tika-abh06t:12122_0: Yojanānayabhedo ca, tasmā tattha na vijjati.
tika-abh06t:12124_0: Māno ca thinamiddhañca, issā macchariyaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t:12134_0: Dve dvāvīsaṃ tayo ceva, nava cātha yathākkamaṃ.
tika-abh06t:12166_0: Vitakko ca vicāro ca, adhikā jhānarāsiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t:12171_0: Adhikā hasite honti, pīti ca vīriyādayo;
tika-abh06t:12193_0: Aṭṭhārasa ca satteko, eko cekova pāpake.
tika-abh06t:12195_0: Dve yevāpanakā honti, rāsayo ca catubbidhā;
tika-abh06t:12229_0: Magge ca tulyapākattā, phale ca niyatā siyuṃ.
tika-abh06t:12232_0: Lokiye labbhamānāpi, visuṃ ceva siyuṃ na vā.
tika-abh06t:12234_0: Pāpā labbhanti pāpesu, satta chakkekakā kamā;
tika-abh06t:12256_0: Tettiṃsa ceva dvattiṃsa, ekatiṃsa ca tiṃsa ca;
tika-abh06t:12262_0: Itthaṃ cuddasadhā bhinnā, koṭṭhāsā tu sarūpato;
tika-abh06t:12263_0: Vibhattā tehi yuttā ca, cittuppādā yathākkamaṃ.
tika-abh06t:12274_0: Nava dve dve tatheko ca, yevāpanakasaṅgahā.
tika-abh06t:12277_0: Dve dve dve tīṇi cekaṃ dve, aṭṭha dasa yathākkamaṃ.
tika-abh06t:12283_0: Catudhā dvīsu catūsu, catūsu dvīsu caṭṭhitā.
tika-abh06t:12289_0: Tehi yuttā panaṭṭhātha, vīsa dve dve tikekakā.
tika-abh06t:12304_0: Navadhā anavajjesu, tehi yuttā ca mānasā.
tika-abh06t:12307_0: Tevīsa kamato satta, dve ca pañcadasāpare.
tika-abh06t:12309_0: Dve ca dve tikadve dvekā, sāvajjesu ca soḷasa;
tika-abh06t:12328_0: Tattha sukhā ca dukkhā ca, adukkhamasukhāti ca;
tika-abh06t:12335_0: Somanassaṃ domanassaṃ, iti nāmaṃ labhanti na.
tika-abh06t:12337_0: Aññattha pana sabbattha, sukhā dukkhā ca vedanā;
tika-abh06t:12338_0: Somanassaṃ domanassaṃ, iti nāmaṃ labhanti ca.
tika-abh06t:12352_0: Sukhayuttā tu tesaṭṭhi, dukkhayuttā tayo tahiṃ;
tika-abh06t:12374_0: Dasa pañcādhikā honti, bhūmibhedā tato tahiṃ;
tika-abh06t:12378_0: Voṭṭhabbane ca hasite, hetu nāma na vijjati.
tika-abh06t:12443_0: Avitakke pakatiyā, tasmā jhānaṃ na vijjati;
tika-abh06t:12453_0: Tehi yuttā ca viññeyyā, cittuppādā yathākkamaṃ.
tika-abh06t:12465_0: Itthaṃ jhānānaṃ bhedena, pañcadhā mānasā ṭhitā.
tika-abh06t:12480_0: Ekañca soḷasa ceti, chabbidhā tattha saṅgaho.
tika-abh06t:12485_0: Lokiyaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ, tathā kāme tihetukaṃ;
tika-abh06t:12488_0: Sesaṃ mahaggataṃ jhānaṃ, sampayuttā ca diṭṭhiyā;
tika-abh06t:12509_0: Itthaṃ pañca cha satta cha-koṭṭhāsā kamato ṭhitā;
tika-abh06t:12517_0: Khandhādayo ca koṭṭhāsā, uddiṭṭhā hi yathārahaṃ.
tika-abh06t:12544_0: Khandhā ṭhapetvā nibbānaṃ, natthi paṇṇatti tīsupi.
tika-abh06t:12546_0: Āhārādi ca koṭṭhāsā, pubbe vuttanayāva te;
tika-abh06t:12550_0: Ye sāvajjāva tesampi, saṅgaho dāni niyyate.
tika-abh06t:12553_0: Cattāro āsavā vuttā, tayo dhammā sarūpato.
tika-abh06t:12560_0: Kāmabbhavo ca paṭigho, māno diṭṭhi ca saṃsayo;
tika-abh06t:12570_0: Dasa saṃyojanā vuttā, sutte satta sarūpato.
tika-abh06t:12572_0: Ganthā dhammā ca cattāro, tayo dhammā sarūpato;
tika-abh06t:12581_0: Dhammā nivaraṇā nāma, chadhā ca pana desitā;
tika-abh06t:12596_0: Dasete tu samānāva, parato ca sarūpato.
tika-abh06t:12598_0: Kāmarāgo ca paṭigho, māno diṭṭhi ca saṃsayo;
tika-abh06t:12600_0: 620. Gāhā ca palibodhā ca, papañcā ceva maññanā.
tika-abh06t:12601_0: Taṇhā māno ca diṭṭhi ca, diṭṭhi taṇhā ca nissayā.
tika-abh06t:12607_0: Saṃyojanā kilesā ca, daseva parato ṭhitā.
tika-abh06t:12622_0: Avijjā sattasu vuttā, paṭigho pana pañcasu.
tika-abh06t:12624_0: Māno ca vicikicchā ca, catuṭṭhānesu uddhaṭo;
tika-abh06t:12625_0: Tīsu dvīsu ca thīnanti, aṭṭhete savibhattikā.
tika-abh06t:12637_0: Subhaṃ sukhaṃ niccamattā, iti dvādasadhā ṭhitā.
tika-abh06t:12639_0: Tattha kāye vedanāsu, citte dhammesu cakkamā;
tika-abh06t:12654_0: Chando ca vīriyaṃ cittaṃ, vīmaṃsāti ca tādinā;
tika-abh06t:12657_0: Saddhindriyañca vīriyaṃ, sati ceva samādhi ca;
tika-abh06t:12661_0: Iti bhinnā vibhattā ca, duvidhāpi mahesinā.
tika-abh06t:12664_0: Passaddhi ca samādhi ca, upekkhāti ca tādinā.
tika-abh06t:12670_0: Sammāsati samādhī ca, maggo aṭṭhaṅgiko mato.
tika-abh06t:12675_0: Navadhā vīriyaṃ vuttaṃ, chasu rāsīsu pañcasu;
tika-abh06t:12678_0: Pañcasveva tu paññā ca, samādhi caturāsiko;
tika-abh06t:12694_0: Apathā ca sucaritā, tathā duccaritāpi ca.
tika-abh06t:12708_0: Pathavāpo ca tejo ca, vāyo ceti catubbidho;
tika-abh06t:12761_0: Rūpaṃ nibhāso bhūtānaṃ, saddo nigghosanaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t:12762_0: Gandho ca gandhanaṃ tattha, raso ca rasanīyatā.
tika-abh06t:12773_0: Taṃ dvayaṃ panupādinne, kāye sabbattha labbhati;
tika-abh06t:12813_0: Lahū mudu ca kammaññaṃ, yadā rūpaṃ pavattati.
tika-abh06t:12828_0: Tadāyaṃ santatākārā, jāti gayhati tassa tu.
tika-abh06t:12845_0: Yena lakkhīyati rūpaṃ, bhinnākāraṃ khaṇe khaṇe;
tika-abh06t:12862_0: Bhūtattayaṃ tu phoṭṭhabbaṃ, katvā chabbīsadhāpi ca;
tika-abh06t:12887_0: Pasādā visayā ceva, pañcakā dvepi sambhavā;
tika-abh06t:12890_0: Yadedaṃ pana sabbampi, rūpaṃ sappaṭighaṃ mataṃ;
tika-abh06t:12899_0: Pasādā ceva viññatti, dvārarūpaṃ tu sattadhā;
tika-abh06t:12905_0: Vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā, bhūtarūpanti aṭṭhadhā;
tika-abh06t:12924_0: Na vatthu tassa sesaṃ tu, sattavīsatividhaṃ bhave.
tika-abh06t:12939_0: Kiñci sārammaṇaṃ nāma, na gayhatīti sabbathā.
tika-abh06t:12941_0: Upādā ajjhattikaṃ rūpaṃ, upādā bāhiraṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t:12947_0: Diṭṭhaṃ rūpaṃ sutaṃ saddo, gandhādi tividhaṃ mutaṃ;
tika-abh06t:12951_0: Aṭṭhārasekakaṃ pañca, catukkanti ca taṃ tathā.
tika-abh06t:12953_0: Dvārañca hoti vatthu ca, na vatthu dvārameva tu;
tika-abh06t:12954_0: Na dvāraṃ vatthumevātha, nobhayanti ca niddise.
tika-abh06t:12965_0: Saddo cittotujo tasmā, rūpamekaṃ dvijaṃ mataṃ;
tika-abh06t:12983_0: Jāti jarā ca maraṇaṃ, na kutocipi jāyati;
tika-abh06t:12998_0: Kammaṃ janeti rūpāni, attajāni khaṇe khaṇe;
tika-abh06t:13004_0: Sandhiyampi kammajaṃ tu, pavattepi ca sambhavā;
tika-abh06t:13005_0: Janeti rūpaṃ sesāni, pavatte, na tu sandhiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t:13008_0: Janeti rūpaṃ matake, bāhire tu yathārahaṃ.
tika-abh06t:13010_0: Iti kammādayo rūpaṃ, janenti ca yathāsakaṃ;
tika-abh06t:13011_0: Sesānampi ca rūpānaṃ, paccayā honti sambhavā.
tika-abh06t:13024_0: Nava cha caturo dve ca, kalāpā ekavīsati.
tika-abh06t:13047_0: Suddhaṭṭhakaṃ tu paṭhamaṃ, saddena navakaṃ bhave;
tika-abh06t:13069_0: Jātimekañca katvā vā, vinātha hadayaṃ tahiṃ.
tika-abh06t:13072_0: Vatthurūpaṃ na niddiṭṭhaṃ, paṭṭhāne desitaṃ tu taṃ.
tika-abh06t:13083_0: Bhāvaddasakamekaṃ vā, katvā vatthuṃ vinā tathā.
tika-abh06t:13086_0: Suddhaṭṭhakā ca satteva, kammajā dasakāni ca.
tika-abh06t:13092_0: Catukkā ca tikadvikā, ekakā ca yathārahaṃ.
tika-abh06t:13094_0: Dve satta nava cha tayo, tayopi ca yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh06t:13162_0: Vuttā cettāvatā tesaṃ, uppādo dāni niyyate.
tika-abh06t:13232_0: Dve satta ca nava pañca, tayo ceko yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh06t:13249_0: Bhuttāhāro ṭhitippatto, mātarā ca sayampi ca;
tika-abh06t:13277_0: Kalāpā tattha labbhanti, dve ca rūpāni uddise.
tika-abh06t:13283_0: Rūpāni ca kalāpā ca, sabbepi ca pavattiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t:13288_0: Dasakesveva gahitaṃ, visuṃ kāme na labbhati;
tika-abh06t:13292_0: Ādikāle na labbhanti, pacchā labbhanti kecipi.
tika-abh06t:13298_0: Asaññibhūmiyaṃ pubbe, vuttāpi ca na labbhare.
tika-abh06t:13303_0: Tasmā tevīsa rūpāni, kalāpā pana cuddasa;
tika-abh06t:13326_0: Duvidhā missitā ceti, bhavanti ca catubbidhā.
tika-abh06t:13346_0: Chakkena saddhiṃ viññeyyā, tasmā tattha cha saṅgahā.
tika-abh06t:13349_0: Aṭṭhako rāsi tattheko, tasmā santati vuccati.
tika-abh06t:13367_0: Dandhaṃ hi vattikaṃ rūpaṃ, nāmaṃ tu lahuvattikaṃ.
tika-abh06t:13369_0: Tathā hi rūpe tiṭṭhante, cittuppādā tu soḷasa;
tika-abh06t:13370_0: Uppajjitvā pavattitvā, bhijjanti ca lahuṃ lahuṃ.
tika-abh06t:13384_0: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe jātaṃ, tasmā rūpaṃ tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t:13387_0: Tassa ṭhitikkhaṇe jātaṃ, rūpampi ca tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t:13390_0: Tassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe jātaṃ, rūpampi ca tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t:13400_0: Eko jāyati eko ca, bhijjatīti ca sabbathā.
tika-abh06t:13414_0: Taṃ nayaṃ paṭibāhitvā, cittena saha bhijjati;
tika-abh06t:13421_0: Rūpaṃ janeti tatthāpi, utu bhaṅgakkhaṇepi ca.
tika-abh06t:13430_0: Ghaṭikā saha labbhanti, tasmā sattaraseva te.
tika-abh06t:13436_0: Dhammānaṃ yamake vuttā, iti pāḷi vadanti ca.
tika-abh06t:13439_0: Iti vatvā pure vuttaṃ, icchantācariyā nayaṃ.
tika-abh06t:13442_0: Rūpāni ca kalāpā ca, ekābaddhā yathārahaṃ.
tika-abh06t:13447_0: Āyukkhayā ca maraṇaṃ, tathā kammakkhayā siyā;
tika-abh06t:13462_0: Utusambhavarūpaṃ tu, avasissati vā na vā.
tika-abh06t:13498_0: Appamaññā ca saññā ca, vavatthāruppakāti ca.
tika-abh06t:13509_0: Aṭṭheva pāḷiyaṃ hitvā, ante tu kasiṇadvayaṃ.
tika-abh06t:13517_0: Buddhe dhamme ca saṅghe ca, sīle cāge ca attanā;
tika-abh06t:13536_0: Disvā sutvā phusitvā vā, parikammaṃ tu kubbato.
tika-abh06t:13538_0: Uggaho nāma sambhoti, nimittaṃ tattha yuñjato;
tika-abh06t:13541_0: Sādhu sattā sukhī hontu, dukkhā muccantu pāṇino;
tika-abh06t:13542_0: Aho sattā sukhappattā, hontu yadicchakāti ca.
tika-abh06t:13559_0: Ekā dasekā dasa ca, tayo pañceti sabbathā;
tika-abh06t:13572_0: Pañcamaṃ vā catutthaṃ vā, javanaṃ hoti appanā.
tika-abh06t:13593_0: Yathāsakaṃ phalānaṃ tu, maggā honti niyāmatā.
tika-abh06t:13630_0: Natthettha koci attā vā, satto jīvo ca puggalo.
tika-abh06t:13632_0: Yathāpi aṅgasambhārā, hoti saddo ratho iti;
tika-abh06t:13633_0: Evaṃ khandhesu santesu, hoti sattoti sammuti.
tika-abh06t:13659_0: Cha vatthūni ca nissāya, cha dvārārammaṇāni ca;
tika-abh06t:13665_0: Avijjāpaccayā honti, saṅkhārā tu tato tathā;
tika-abh06t:13668_0: Phasso ca vedanā taṇhā, upādānaṃ bhavo tato;
tika-abh06t:13748_0: Patvā kalāpato tāva, sammaseyya tato paraṃ.
tika-abh06t:13762_0: Aniccā te khayaṭṭhena, khandhā dukkhā bhayaṭṭhato;
tika-abh06t:13772_0: Samudayā nirodhā ca, pañcannaṃ dassitā tathā.
tika-abh06t:13793_0: Obhāso pīti passaddhi, adhimokkho ca paggaho;
tika-abh06t:13794_0: Sukhaṃ ñāṇamupaṭṭhānaṃ, upekkhā ca nikanti ca.
tika-abh06t:13827_0: Patante ca vayante ca, bhijjanticceva saṅkhate;
tika-abh06t:13836_0: Niccā ce na nirujjheyya, na bādheyya sukhā yadi;
tika-abh06t:13837_0: Vase vatteyya attā ce, tadabhāvā na te tathā.
tika-abh06t:13845_0: Aniccā dukkhānattā ca, saṅkhārāva na cāparo;
tika-abh06t:13846_0: Attā vā attanīyaṃ vā, nāhaṃ na tu mamāti ca.
tika-abh06t:13858_0: Tīradassīva sakuṇo, yāva pāraṃ na passati.
tika-abh06t:13871_0: Vuṭṭhānagāminī nāma, yadā hoti tadā pana.
tika-abh06t:13874_0: Maggo tato phalaṃ hoti, bhavaṅgā paccavekkhaṇā.
tika-abh06t:13879_0: Catutthaṃ pañcamaṃ vātha, chaṭṭhaṃ vāpi yathārahaṃ;
tika-abh06t:13882_0: Tato phalāni tīṇi dve, ekaṃ vātha yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh06t:13891_0: Hīne kilese sese ca, paccavekkhati vā na vā.
tika-abh06t:13893_0: Tato ca puna saṅkhāre, vipassanto yathā pure;
tika-abh06t:13909_0: Sakimeva imaṃ lokaṃ, āgantvā hoti mānusaṃ.
tika-abh06t:13918_0: Dvidhāpi catudhā yuggā, aṭṭha honti vibhāgato.
tika-abh06t:13952_0: Maggo ca parijānāti, dukkhaṃ tebhūmakaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t:13971_0: Aggamaggo pajahati, klese sese ca sabbathā.
tika-abh06t:14009_0: Cittaṃ cetasikaṃ rūpaṃ, nibbānampi ca bhājitaṃ;
tika-abh06t:14013_0: Duvidhā hoti paññatti, atthapaññatti tattha ca.
tika-abh06t:14021_0: Atthā hi paramatthatthā, paññattatthāti ca dvidhā;
tika-abh06t:14033_0: Yena vuccati taṃ nāmaṃ, paññapetīti vuccati;
tika-abh06t:14034_0: Paññattīti ca sā nāmapaññattīti tato matā.
tika-abh06t:14036_0: Saṅkhā samaññā paññatti, vohāroti ca bhājitā;
tika-abh06t:14058_0: Nayaṃ gahetvā etthāpi, paññatti duvidhā katā.
tika-abh06t:14090_0: Tasmā saṃsāramāpanno, satto nāma sa puggalo;
tika-abh06t:14093_0: Svāyaṃ khandhādito satto, aññoti ca na vuccati;
tika-abh06t:14096_0: Khandhā khandhānamevāyaṃ, sattoti ca na vuccati;
tika-abh06t:14105_0: Mato jāto ca na sveva, khandhabhedopacārato;
tika-abh06t:14147_0: Bālo yo so ca me attā,
tika-abh06t:14164_0: Tadaññe pana bālā ca, titthiyāpi akovidā;
tika-abh06t:14193_0: Catudhā tividhā vātha, cintanā tattha icchitā.
tika-abh06t:14232_0: Vibhattā nāmapaññatti, chabbidhā hoti tattha hi.
tika-abh06t:14241_0: Tevijjo chaḷabhiñño ca, sīlavā paññavāpi ca.
tika-abh06t:14256_0: Paññatti duvidhā ceti, ñeyyatthā chabbidhā matāti.
tika-abh06t:14303_0: Cakkhu sotañca ghānañca, jivhā kāyo pabhā ravo;
tika-abh06t:14304_0: Gandho rasojā itthī ca, pumā vatthu ca jīvitaṃ.
tika-abh06t:14306_0: Khaṃ jāti jaratā bhaṅgo, rūpassa lahutā tathā;
tika-abh06t:14313_0: Bhāvadvayaṃ tu kāyaṃva, byāpi no sahavuttikaṃ.
tika-abh06t:14319_0: Rūpanibbatti pāko ca, bhedo ceva yathākkamaṃ.
tika-abh06t:14321_0: Lahutādittayaṃ taṃ hi, rūpānaṃ kamato siyā;
tika-abh06t:14334_0: Vatthunā vatthu tāneva, dvārā viññattibhī saha.
tika-abh06t:14340_0: Vināpaṃ ādito yāva, rasā thūlaṃ na cetaraṃ.
tika-abh06t:14345_0: Aṭṭhārasādito rūpā, nipphannaṃ tu na cetaraṃ;
tika-abh06t:14346_0: Phoṭṭhabbamāpavajjaṃ tu, bhūtaṃ kāme na cetaraṃ.
tika-abh06t:14349_0: Vaṇṇaṃ taditaraṃ thūlaṃ, sukhumañceti taṃ tidhā.
tika-abh06t:14354_0: Diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutañcāpi, viññātaṃ vata cetasā;
tika-abh06t:14355_0: Ekamekañca pañcāpi, vīsati ca kamā siyuṃ.
tika-abh06t:14358_0: Vatthu dvārañca sesāni, vatthu dvārañca no siyā.
tika-abh06t:14367_0: Ñeyyā pavatti rūpassa, piṇḍānañca vasā kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t:14369_0: Kammajaṃ sendriyaṃ vatthu, viññatti cittajā ravo;
tika-abh06t:14372_0: Aṭṭhakaṃ jāti cākāso, catujā jaratā khayaṃ;
tika-abh06t:14373_0: Kutoci neva jātaṃ tappākabhedaṃ hi taṃ dvayaṃ.
tika-abh06t:14376_0: Lakkhaṇābhāvato tassā, sati tasmiṃ na niṭṭhiti.
tika-abh06t:14378_0: Kammacittānalannehi, piṇḍā nava ca satta ca;
tika-abh06t:14379_0: Cattāro dve ca viññeyyā, sajīve dve ajīvake.
tika-abh06t:14382_0: Cakkhādī pañca dasakā, kalāpā nava kammajā.
tika-abh06t:14388_0: Cittajā iti viññeyyā, kalāpā satta vā cha vā.
tika-abh06t:14394_0: Satta cattāri dve ceti, kalāpā vīsatī dvibhi.
tika-abh06t:14396_0: Tayaṭṭhakā ca cattāro, navakā dasakā nava;
tika-abh06t:14397_0: Tayo dveko ca ekena, dasa dvīhi ca tīhi ca.
tika-abh06t:14405_0: Yena santappanaṃ yena, jīraṇaṃ dahanaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t:14415_0: Dvijā dvattiṃsa koṭṭhāsā, sesā eva catubbhavā.
tika-abh06t:14420_0: Dvijesu manatejehi, dve dve honti panaṭṭhakā;
tika-abh06t:14436_0: Dasakā navakā ceva, aṭṭhakā ca siyuṃ kamā.
tika-abh06t:14442_0: Ṭhiti na pāṭhe cittassa, na bhaṅge rūpasambhavo.
tika-abh06t:14445_0: Atthīti ce pabandhena, ṭhiti tattha pavuccati.
tika-abh06t:14455_0: Tato parañca kammaggicittajā te ca piṇḍikā;
tika-abh06t:14456_0: Aṭṭhakā ca duve pubbe, vuttavuttakkhaṇe vade.
tika-abh06t:14464_0: Bhaṅgā sattarasuppāde, jāyate kammajaṃ na taṃ;
tika-abh06t:14465_0: Taduddhaṃ jāyate tasmā, takkhayā maraṇaṃ bhave.
tika-abh06t:14477_0: Yuttiyā idha viññeyyā, pañca vā caturopi vā.
tika-abh06t:14483_0: Pañca cha utucittehi, pañca chāsaññinaṃ bhave.
tika-abh06t:14495_0: Atha vā tehi viññeyyaṃ, dasakaṃ navakaṭṭhakaṃ.
tika-abh06t:14507_0: Kāyikaṃ mānasaṃ dukkhaṃ, sukhopekkhā ca vedanā;
tika-abh06t:14510_0: Yathā tathā vā saññāṇaṃ, saññā satinibandhanaṃ;
tika-abh06t:14518_0: Saddhā sati hirottappaṃ, cāgo mettā mati puna;
tika-abh06t:14524_0: Lobho doso ca moho ca, diṭṭhi uddhaccameva ca;
tika-abh06t:14527_0: Māno issā ca maccheraṃ, kukkuccaṃ thinamiddhakaṃ;
tika-abh06t:14530_0: Byāpāro cetanā phasso, phusanaṃ saraṇaṃ tahiṃ;
tika-abh06t:14534_0: Vīriyaṃ pīnanā pīti, chando tu kattukāmatā.
tika-abh06t:14541_0: Alaggo ca acaṇḍikkaṃ, cāgo mettā mati pana;
tika-abh06t:14576_0: Kāme rūpe ca sesā cha-cattālīsa tidhātujā.
tika-abh06t:14579_0: Dayādī pañca mānādī, cha yevāpana soḷasa.
tika-abh06t:14588_0: Pīti ekaggatā ceti, satta vittittayena ve.
tika-abh06t:14624_0: Diṭṭhi dosena te ganthā, ganthato diṭṭhiha dvidhā.
tika-abh06t:14641_0: Dudhādiṭṭhi tidhā lobhaṃ, bhitvā sutte dasīritā.
tika-abh06t:14646_0: Diṭṭhi eva parāmāso, ñeyyo evaṃ samāsato;
tika-abh06t:14657_0: Aṭṭha pañca cattāri ca, cattāri kamato kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t:14668_0: Etesvekamayaṃ hutvā, vatthuṃ nissāya vā na vā;
tika-abh06t:14678_0: Pacchā paccati pākānaṃ, pavatte aṭṭhake duve.
tika-abh06t:14680_0: Tesuyeva nihīnaṃ tu, datvā sandhiṃ duhetukaṃ;
tika-abh06t:14681_0: Deti dvādasa pāke ca, pavatte dhīyutaṃ vinā.
tika-abh06t:14723_0: Pāpaṃ kāmikamevekaṃ, hetuto taṃ dvidhā puna;
tika-abh06t:14736_0: Nissāya vā na vā honti, vadhādisahitā kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t:14742_0: Paccate gocaraṃ tassa, sakalaṃ amalaṃ vinā.
tika-abh06t:14748_0: Ahetū pañca ñāṇāni, gahaṇaṃ tīraṇā ubho.
tika-abh06t:14772_0: Hitvā mokkhamukhaṃ taṃ hi, dvidhā magge tidhā phale.
tika-abh06t:14783_0: Vuttiyā na phale pupphaṃ, yathā chinnalatā phalaṃ.
tika-abh06t:14786_0: Na phale vattamānampi, moghapupphaṃ phalaṃ yathā.
tika-abh06t:14801_0: Tadālambaṃ tato tamhā, cuti hoti javehi vā.
tika-abh06t:14810_0: Tajjaṃ vatthuṃ sahuppannaṃ, nissāya vā na vā tahiṃ.
tika-abh06t:14812_0: Tajjā sandhi siyā hitvā, antarattaṃ bhavantare;
tika-abh06t:14813_0: Antarattaṃ vinā dūre, paṭisandhi kathaṃ bhave.
tika-abh06t:14818_0: Nāsaññā cavamānassa, nimittaṃ na cutī ca yaṃ;
tika-abh06t:14830_0: Pañcadvāre siyā sandhi, vinā kammaṃ dvigocare;
tika-abh06t:14833_0: Tamevante cuti tasmiṃ, gocare cavanena tu;
tika-abh06t:14845_0: Santīraṇaṃ tato tamhā, voṭṭhabbañca sakiṃ tato;
tika-abh06t:14849_0: Javā mahante voṭṭhabbā, paritte nitare manaṃ.
tika-abh06t:14851_0: Voṭṭhabbassa paritte tu, dvattikkhattuṃ javo viya;
tika-abh06t:14852_0: Vadanti vuttiṃ taṃ pāṭhe, anāsevanato na hi.
tika-abh06t:14858_0: Javokāme vibhūte tu, kāmavhe visaye tato.
tika-abh06t:14860_0: Kāmīnaṃ tu tadālambaṃ, bhavaṅgaṃ tu tato siyā;
tika-abh06t:14861_0: Avibhūte paritte ca, bhavaṅgaṃ javato bhave.
tika-abh06t:14867_0: Viruddhattā bhavaṅgaṃ na, kiṃ siyā sukhasandhino.
tika-abh06t:14876_0: Ime sandhi bhavaṅgā ca, cuti cekūnavīsati.
tika-abh06t:14878_0: Dve dve āvajjanādīni, gahaṇantāni tīṇi tu;
tika-abh06t:14904_0: Tidhā chanava caṭṭha ca, tinavā ca yathākkamaṃ.
tika-abh06t:14906_0: Dvipañca cittaṃ viññāṇaṃ, tisso hi manodhātuyo;
tika-abh06t:14913_0: Sesaṃ chārammaṇaṃ taṃ hi, tecattālīsa saṅkhyato.
tika-abh06t:14931_0: Sesā cuddasa bhinnāvacuti sandhi na tīṇipi.
tika-abh06t:14940_0: Tayaṃ mutaṃ manodhātuttayaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ.
tika-abh06t:14942_0: Diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ ñātaṃ, sābhiññaṃ sesakāmikaṃ;
tika-abh06t:14955_0: Tettiṃsa ca bhavantete, rūpesu pana puññato.
tika-abh06t:14958_0: Āruppapuññato te ca, sako pāko sayaṃ puna.
tika-abh06t:14972_0: Sakaṃ sakaṃ paṭicchaṃ tu, viññāṇehi dvipañcahi;
tika-abh06t:14984_0: Kāme javā bhavaṅgā ca, kāmarūpe sayampi vā;
tika-abh06t:14990_0: Te ca pākā sayañcante, phalaṃ majjhā mahaggatā;
tika-abh06t:14991_0: Kriyāti vīsati honti, sesadvīhi dukehi tu.
tika-abh06t:14996_0: Atha sātakriyā sātaṃ, sesaṃ sesakriyāpi ca;
tika-abh06t:15005_0: Dvīhi kāmajavā tīhi, rūpārūpā catūhi tu;
tika-abh06t:15006_0: Maggā chahi phalādi dve, sesā dve pana sattahi.
tika-abh06t:15021_0: Ñeyyā sesāni cattāri, bhavaṅgena ca labbhare.
tika-abh06t:15030_0: Hāsāvajje jave rūpe, aṭṭhachakkehi tehi tu.
tika-abh06t:15054_0: Rūpe javāti bāvīsa, dvijā sesā tidhātujā.
tika-abh06t:15062_0: Dosahīnajavā so so, pāko rūpe anāriye;
tika-abh06t:15077_0: Tike ca tatiye ekaṃ, dve honti dutiyattike.
tika-abh06t:15111_0: Dve balāni ahetvantadvaye tīṇi tu saṃsaye;
tika-abh06t:15115_0: Abalāni hi sesāni, vīriyantaṃ balaṃ bhave.
tika-abh06t:15120_0: Tatiye sāmale tīṇi, cattāri dutiye tathā;
tika-abh06t:15121_0: Kāme nippītike cāpi, pañcaṅgāni hi sesake.
tika-abh06t:15138_0: Kriyato vā tadālambaṃ, sopekkhāya sukhī na hi;
tika-abh06t:15152_0: Ete pītādhikā hāse, vāyāmena ca dvādhikā;
tika-abh06t:15175_0: Matiṃ pītiṃ matippītiṃ, hitvā te kamato siyuṃ.
tika-abh06t:15178_0: Tatthetā niyatā vittiṃ, vade sabbattha sambhavā.
tika-abh06t:15194_0: Ye vuttā ettakā ettha, iti cetasikākhilā;
tika-abh06t:15216_0: Lobho aṭṭhasu cittesu, thinamiddhaṃ tu pañcasu.
tika-abh06t:15218_0: Māno catūsu diṭṭhi ca, tathā dvīsu manesu hi;
tika-abh06t:15219_0: Doso issā ca maccheraṃ, kukkuccañca bhavantime.
tika-abh06t:15228_0: Kadalī māyā viññeyyā, khandhānaṃ tu yathākkamaṃ.
tika-abh06t:15234_0: Tatthādī dukkhavatthuttā, dukkhā bhārā ca khādakā.
tika-abh06t:15247_0: Abhāvassa hi kummānaṃ, lomasseva na vācatā.
tika-abh06t:15249_0: Khayoti vuccate maggo, tappāpattā idaṃ khayaṃ;
tika-abh06t:15262_0: To rūpaṃ natthi attādivatthūti ca vavatthape.
tika-abh06t:15268_0: Yanti yuttā yathā evaṃ, nāmarūpavhayā kriyā.
tika-abh06t:15270_0: Na nāmarūpato añño, attādi iti dassanaṃ;
tika-abh06t:15276_0: Sadā sabbattha sabbesaṃ, sadisaṃ na yato tato;
tika-abh06t:15279_0: Evaṃ tīrayate kaṅkhā, yāya paññāya paccaye;
tika-abh06t:15280_0: Diṭṭhattā suddhi sā kaṅkhātaraṇaṃ iti vuccati.
tika-abh06t:15318_0: Sati pītādhimokkho ca, nikanti ca dasīritā.
tika-abh06t:15324_0: Na maggo gāhavatthuttā, tesaṃ iti vipassati.
tika-abh06t:15336_0: Bbayādī ghaṭamānassa, nava honti panettha hi.
tika-abh06t:15345_0: Bhaṅgeva tiṭṭhate ñāṇaṃ, tadā bhaṅgamatī siyā.
tika-abh06t:15347_0: Evaṃ passayato bhaṅgaṃ, tibhavo khāyate yadā;
tika-abh06t:15348_0: Sīhādiva bhayaṃ hutvā, siyā laddhā bhayikkhaṇā.
tika-abh06t:15354_0: Mati yadā tadā laddhā, siyā nibbidapassanā.
tika-abh06t:15357_0: Jālādīhi ca macchādī, tadā laddhā cajjamati.
tika-abh06t:15366_0: Catudhā chabbidhā cāpi, bahudhā passato bhusaṃ.
tika-abh06t:15374_0: Na passe yāva sā tīraṃ, sāmuddasakuṇī yathā.
tika-abh06t:15382_0: Aniccato hi vuṭṭhānaṃ, yadi yassāsi yogino;
tika-abh06t:15385_0: Dukkhatonattato tañce, siyā honti kamena te;
tika-abh06t:15403_0: Te sabbe aṭṭhamokkhānaṃ, lābhī ce chasu majjhasu;
tika-abh06t:15406_0: Anulomāni cattāri, tīṇi dve vā bhavanti hi;
tika-abh06t:15419_0: Phalāni ekaṃ dve tīṇi, tato vuttamatikkamā.
tika-abh06t:15437_0: Na labbhālātacakkaṃva, taṃ hi rūpādayo vinā.
tika-abh06t:15439_0: Tena tena pakārena, rūpādiṃ na vihāya tu;
tika-abh06t:15442_0: Labbhate parikappena, yato taṃ na musā tato;
tika-abh06t:15448_0: Pathavādi viyekopi, puggalo na yato tato;
tika-abh06t:15451_0: Etaṃ visayato katvā, saṅkhādīhi padehi tu;
tika-abh06t:15455_0: Kāyaṃ paññatti ce suṭṭhu, vadato suṇa saccato.
tika-abh06t:15469_0: Vibhāgaṃ ñāpanatthaṃ hi, tathuddeso katoti ce;
tika-abh06t:15482_0: Iti sā nāmapaññatti, dutiyāti ca kittitā.
